Title: An das Eldenwald team
Content:
Can you use the shabby one well for already duels and would it be better to buy the shabby one in the Karate Edition and would it be better to buy the wand in a wholesale store in Eldenwald or a small one because where I live there is only one Eldenwald store in Kaiserslautern in the mall. 
PS Thanks for uploading such great videos on YouTube, I've been following you for a long time and I'm always happy when a new video comes out.
Comment: Hi Nolan, here is the response from the wand expert Chris: "Yes, it is suitable for show duels. A bit long, but it is plain and stable and easy to grip. No frills that could break quickly." Whether you choose the Ollivander or the Character Edition depends on how you want to store the wand between duels. The wands do not differ between the two variants. Both variants are currently in stock in Kaiserslautern, and there is also another variant with the wand in plain packaging. My colleagues on site will be happy to advise you. Best regards from the Elven Forest!

Title: Bin sehr enttäuscht
Content:
I always expect good quality from Elbenwald and my expectations have mostly been met, but I am more than disappointed with this product.

The gilded zinc alloy looks more like plastic, and when I inquired at the hotline, they simply told me that I could return it if I was dissatisfied with the product.

In my opinion, Elbenwald should check with the manufacturer to see if it really is a gilded zinc alloy.

Furthermore, my hourglass is dirty inside.

I will keep the time-turner nonetheless because I am a huge fan.
However, I am not satisfied.
Comment: Hi Kleene, of course we'll exchange your time turner with the dirty hourglass, so you don't have to live with it. The material is correct, we checked this again just recently. A zinc alloy is very light, and together with the soft gilding, it can feel like magic is at play. Best wishes from the Elvenwood!

Title: Note: M
Content:
I bought the shirt for myself a month ago. My joy that there was finally something to go with my house was huge and the anticipation was great... the greater the disappointment. The white is very translucent and feels very thin (similar to a pajama top). Although nothing ran in the wash (I was already worried because of the dark sleeves), it was noticeably shorter afterward—and no, I didn't wash it too hot. So far, I've never had any problems with your shirts in this regard.
Therefore, I cannot recommend it for purchase (unless maybe as a top for pajamas).

Title: Echt genial.
Content: Hello hello dear Elbenwäldler. First of all, a huge compliment to you. The shipping was super fast. I think the medallion looks exactly like it does in the movie. I really like it a lot. But still, I noticed something that I find strange. Maybe you can help me. On the medallion, runes are depicted. Upon closer inspection, I noticed that these runes have nothing to do with Harry Potter. Because on this medallion, the runes of various archdemons are depicted. Such as, for example, the symbol of Lucifer or Ba'al. Also, Lilith's symbol and the sign of Baphomet are depicted. Now my question is, is this intentional or how do such symbols come to be on a fan item? Please answer this question for me. I am very knowledgeable about such symbols and the paranormal, and precisely for this reason, I am a bit confused. Best regards. Lizzy.
Comment: Hi Lizzy, first of all, thank you for your praise; we are very pleased about it. Regarding the runes and their meaning, we can't say too much, as we are not the manufacturer of this product and this replica is very closely based on the original from the film. As far as we, as Potterheads, can assess, the runes were indeed inspired by real existing symbols (e.g., for planets), but were not taken exactly as they are. Best regards from the Elvenwood!

Title: Äh
Content: It's not exactly funny that you should tell the truth because how would you feel if you spent 300 euros or so and then it turned out to be a BROOM that CAN'T FLY.
Comment:
Dear Harry12,

this was not intended as a joke. Our Nimbus 2001 is a broomstick in its basic form that is non-magical. However, we have no influence over what you or any other wizard does with it. No one is stopping you from hexing the broom and conjuring the desired flying abilities. (In this case, however, we cannot promise the exact flight characteristics of the original Nimbus 2001.)

At this point, we must fulfill our duty and refer to the International Statute of Wizarding Secrecy of 1689. Every wizard is obliged to conceal their magical abilities from Muggles. This includes all kinds of spells, magical creatures, and – of course – flying broomsticks.

Best regards from the Elvenwood!

Title: Einfach MAGISCH!!!!
Content:
The delivery was very fast, we ordered at noon and it arrived the very next day. Super delivery!
The wand is also super classy and intact, I was just a bit surprised that the white stripe was a bit faded, but otherwise it's great!

(Wish: It would be cool if the name of the character was printed on the lid of the packaging and then on a "burnt" looking "Pergarment," and I would wish if you could release a wand from Bellatrix in the Noble Collection, the "curved" wand she has towards the end of the brilliant film series.)

I would order from Elbenwald again anytime!!!!
QUESTION: Can these wands actually bend a little bit?! No, right?!

Wishing you a magical evening!! Tschüüüss.
Comment: Hi Albus, we don't make the wands ourselves, so unfortunately I can't tell you anything about other packaging. The first wand of Bellatrix (the Bent one) is only available for purchase in our Elbenwald Stores, not in the online shop. The wands cannot be bent, they would break. And what a broken wand can do, you saw that in the second part, right? Best wishes from Elbenwald!

Title: unterirdische Qualität
Content: I ordered the costume in M for Carnival with a body height of 1.80m. The delivery was on time, but unfortunately the costume was completely unacceptable. The suit has high water up to the knees and is also cut so short on the upper body that it sticks out at the front and back instead of lying close. The seam at the shoulder was already frayed. The leg guards are yellow and look really cheap, they are not even fully decorated with a pattern but only half covered with fabric. They look completely different from the picture, in the costume's video you only get a fleeting glimpse of them. However, the worst part is the belt, which is already crumbling on all sides and has stains inside, so it was delivered damaged. In short, I'm sending the costume back, the price-performance ratio is absolutely not right here.
Comment: Hi DW, this should of course not have happened, and we honestly apologize. Please contact our customer support, we would be happy to assist you with the return. Best regards from Elbenwald!

Content: I bought this jacket in one of your stores because I really liked the design. The zipper was very bad from the start and kept getting stuck. However, I overlooked that because I really loved the jacket otherwise. I then washed it and was shocked afterwards: The fabric around the wolf's head came loose. Unfortunately, I can't upload a picture here. There are no complete holes, but the outer fabric has come off in large areas. I didn't wash the jacket too hot or anything... so I really don't know why. Right now it's still okay... it looks a bit like a deliberately torn pair of jeans... but I'm worried that the wolf will lose its lower jaw the next time I wash it, because it's already quite loose... and that would really look bad.... very disappointing. I'm usually used to very good quality from you. And for what I got now, I would never have paid 40 euros :/
Comment: Hi Anna, we are truly sorry this happened and it shouldn't have. Please send us a message to our customer support, together we will surely find a solution. Best wishes from Elbenwald!

Title: Farbe geht ab
Content:
Dear Elbenwald Team,

I purchased this beautiful wand a little over a year ago from the Elbenwald store in Leipzig. It looks wonderful and feels good in the hand.

Most of the time, I keep it in its packaging. Recently, I took it out before the book fair because it was part of my costume. And what do I find? The color is coming off. The entire wand is now no longer beautifully uniform, but spotted. For the price, I really expected more.

Best regards,
Miriam

Title: Wirklich hübsch, aber...
Content:
The shirt is really pretty, the thin fabric is very comfortable to wear, unfortunately, after the first wash, the big disappointment came:
Although I washed it at 30°C as recommended in the washing instructions, the print was almost completely gone.
You can only see a faint "shadow" of the emblem.
I find this really annoying, as I've never had this problem with other printed shirts before, and now I'm going to go to the store where I bought it to complain about it.
What a shame!
Comment: Hi Victoria, we honestly regret this and it shouldn't be like this. Together with my colleagues in the store, we will surely find a solution. Best wishes from Elbenwald!

Title: Außen hui, innen pfui
Content: When the medallion arrived, I was initially thrilled. It looks really elegant from the outside. Nicely crafted from metal, quite heavy (but not too heavy). Unfortunately, the disappointment came when I tried to insert the battery: the internal construction is extremely cheap, the battery didn't stay in place and kept sliding down. Result: only one eye lit up. I then tried again to place the battery better, and the holder promptly broke... and I was really careful. I sent it back afterwards and hope to get my money refunded. Unfortunately, it was a disappointment.
Comment: Hi Mark, we honestly regret this and it shouldn't be like this. If you have any further questions about your return, just send us a message to our customer support. Best regards from Elbenwald!

Title: Anders als erwartet
Content:
Fawkes is well-made and very colorful. But I still didn't like him - he looks very misshapen, with a fat belly and a tiny head. The facial expression was also different from what I expected - as if he had just woken up.
Overall, I imagined him to be somehow more majestic, and not like a comic character.
But if you like this style, then you can't go wrong with the good craftsmanship.

Title: Schöner Stein
Content:
The stone was made very beautifully. Great display. As several others have already written, I find it a pity that the stone looks a bit different from the photo. It is more orange than red and not as worn as in the photo. But it looks very nice in the display. I was a bit surprised by the size, I had imagined it a bit bigger. 
What I find very unfortunate is that the glass dome is very tightly held in the Styrofoam. I had to tear the Styrofoam to remove the dome, as we couldn't get it out otherwise. Since I like to keep the packaging in case I need to repack it later, I find this very unfortunate. Unfortunately, the delivery was also very delayed this time (despite delivery to Switzerland and Easter), usually it goes faster.
Comment: Hi Urs2030, I sincerely apologize that the packaging did not survive the unpacking process entirely, but we have no influence over this as it comes from the manufacturer. Your order arrived at your home in Switzerland within 5 working days. Best regards from the Elbenwald!

Title: Überragend aber...
Content:
First things first, I think you guys are great and you're doing a cool job. 
Everything arrived wonderfully and intact in advance, but I just wanted to point out that the type of packaging was a bit disadvantageous. 
The box was nice and big, the bubble wrap was very good and served its purpose, but the item was directly on the bubble wrap in the box, so it could have been possible that the "good" postman, in his haste and endless stress, didn't secure the package properly in the car or possibly even dropped it, or, or, or.... 
Long story short, the item was indeed stable, but it would be a shame if a package containing something more delicate arrived damaged from you, although I'm sure you pay special attention to such things because you're just awesome. 

Enough flattery, I wish you lots of ideas and continued success. 

Best regards
Comment: Hi Fabian, you are absolutely right, we pay individual attention to ensuring that each item is packaged securely for transport. Thank you very much for your praise and best regards from the Elbenwald!

Title: Ist das reines Titan?
Content:
First of all, I find the ring very beautiful and it fits me well. It was delivered within 3 days. However, I measured and weighed it again and came to the conclusion, based on my calculations, that the ring cannot be made of titanium alone:
R: ([Pi]×6.1mm)÷4×(20.3^2mm-19.1^2mm)
=226.515mm^3 which corresponds to 0.226515cm^3

Titanium has a density of 4.54g/cm^3. Therefore, the ring should weigh 0.226515×4.54= approximately 1g. But it weighs 4g. So either I made a mistake in my calculations, my scale is not working, or there is still iron or something like that in it. If that is the case, please mention it in the product description.
Otherwise, it's great.
Comment: Hi LordofValar, we inquired again with the manufacturer, the ring is made of titanium. Best wishes from the Elvenwood!

Title: Einfach Zauberhaft!
Content:
My Elder Wand arrived right on time today, and I am overwhelmed! The packaging is VERY high-quality, not to mention the wand itself: it feels heavy in the hand and has the sensation of real wood. Plus, it looks very elaborate. At first, I thought 40 cm might be a bit too long, but it's really perfect and highly recommended as a first wand.

However, I do have one question: In the Character Edition, a small clip is always included (not in the Ollivander Edition). Can this clip be purchased separately if you want to display the wand in a showcase?

Thank you very much for this WONDERFUL wand, it certainly won't be my last! Dumbledore would be proud of you!

Best regards,
Leo Potter :)
Comment: Hi Leo, I'm very glad that you love the Elderstaff as much as I do. Unfortunately, the name clip is only available with the character edition, and we can't purchase it individually, I'm really sorry. Best wishes from the Elvenwood!

After a quick click, you can see if the chain is currently available at an Elbenwald store near you. Best wishes from Elbenwald!

Title: Besser gehts kaum
Content: The Chalice is the hammer! I bought it a while ago and I was thrilled! It is extremely well-made and feels pleasantly heavy in the hand. The price didn't deter me, however. The only small flaw: the felt or fabric on the base of the chalice is slightly misaligned. Now, you don't necessarily see that, since the chalice is displayed as a collector's item, but I did find it a bit disappointing! One more little question: is the chalice actually gilded? Because in your video about Horcruxes on YouTube, you mentioned that, but honestly, the golden color is quite dark to really be considered gilded! It wouldn't be a big deal if it wasn't, but I'm just curious!
Comment: Hi Paul, the chalice is not gilded, but only painted with gold paint. Best wishes from the Elven Forest!

Title: Temporär ganz nett...
Content: I bought this ring for my Lord of the Rings-enthusiast partner to give to him for Christmas. Since then, he has worn it every day, and after just a few months, the color of the ring faded, the chain turned copper-colored, and it always left a greenish tint on his neck where the chain rested. As of today, a little over half a year later, the chain and the ring look like they've been in use for decades, and even my cheapest chain has lasted longer, despite daily use. It's a shame that the ring wore out so quickly; for 30 euros, I expected more, but oh well, one learns from disappointments.
Comment: Hi Veronique, we are truly sorry about this. Please send us a message to our customer support, together we will surely find a solution. Best wishes from Elbenwald!

Title: Aussehen Top - Funktion mangelhaft

Title: Erster Einsatz: mehrere Nähte platzen
Content:
The price seems somewhat reasonable, so it's okay but really not a masterpiece. However, the fabric quality of the piece I received was apparently very poor. I used it directly at the Dragon Festival after purchasing it: three and a half days of movement (and NO fighting! - City dwellers)

The first seam at the hip came apart, or rather the fabric gave way at the seam, and the fabric was so stretched that I can't sew much more on it. The same thing happened later at the crotch.

The buttonholes are also just threads.

Maybe I got a Sunday model, so I definitely cannot recommend it.
Comment: Hi Rene, this really shouldn't have happened, and we can only apologize for it. Please send us a message to our customer support, together we will surely find a solution. Best wishes from Elbenwald!

Title: Sehr gut - Bezahlverfahren Schlecht
Content: The gift card is beautifully designed and serves its purpose. I am not satisfied with the offered payment methods. In fact, there are no secure payment methods available! In none of the chosen options can I trust the correct and confidential transfer and processing of my bank details. Why? Allowing a third party to make transfers from my account - absolutely not. Shopping on Amazon - a monopoly company that processes and sells data? Absolutely not. Using a credit card, whose user and profile data are sold to Google? Also not. PayPal? Multiple times in disrepute - absolutely not. What's left? Correct! Nothing. Why don't you offer payment methods anymore, like the ones you could use elsewhere? Very simply via your own online transfer. What does the third-party provider do with my account that I can't do myself? I definitely cannot use the Elbenwald Store as I would like to, due to the above-mentioned restrictions. It's very unfortunate, because many shops are increasingly choosing against data protection and for an "alleged" improvement of customer service. I have a different perspective on this. That's why I'm also deducting two points. Thank you very much.
Comment: Hi Jonas, thank you very much for your feedback. Here you can find an overview of our payment methods, some of which are currently unavailable due to an internal adjustment. Thank you for your understanding and best regards from Elbenwald!

Title: Enttäuschend und sein Geld nicht wert.
Content:
I bought the shirt as a gift for my friend. At first, everything was fine: the size was right, the print was really nice, and the colors were clear and bright as shown.

After the first wash, things started to go wrong: the shirt became misshapen and looked worn, even though it was washed according to the care instructions. I then adjusted it a bit, which at least temporarily alleviated the problem. But after the second wash, I was utterly disappointed: Not only did the shirt become worn and misshapen again, but it also had two holes! (To preempt any questions: My very modern washing machine has never shredded anything before.) If you hold the shirt up to the light, you can also see that the fabric around the holes is extremely thin.

I'm really disappointed, and although I have some JINX and Blizzard items here, I'll think twice about it in the future. The t-shirt is really not worth the money. Too bad.
Comment: Hi Anne, I'm truly sorry this happened and it shouldn't have. Please send us a message to our customer support, together we'll surely find a solution. Best wishes from Elbenwald!

Title: Größenvielfalt?
Content:
I think the pajama looks great, but based on what I'm hearing about the sizes, XL might only correspond to a size 42, which is already a bit small. It would be nice if the pajama were available at least up to size 44/46... As it stands now, I'll have to stick with the Primark pajamas, which go up to size 48;) But I would love it if there were more size options for the higher-quality models here, I really like quality:)

Best regards

Title: Schwingen oder lieber doch nicht?
Content: I am considering getting the sword, but it is not cheap and I understand that given the amount of work that went into it. I also know that you shouldn't play with it or even fight with it, but can I hold it in my hand and gently swing it back and forth, or is that too dangerous? Apart from the general danger of swinging a sword, I would be interested to know if it would be dangerous, if such movements could cause something to break off the sword, etc.

Title: Frechheit!
Content:
Faulty delivery. 
Right sloppy, we ordered the package 5 days ago, it arrived on Saturday, we opened it this evening (Sunday). What did we find? 
Correct. Wrong product and wrong delivery address. 
First thought, how can that be, until we realized that the company Elbenwald sent us the wrong package to our address. So, some random person now has our package and my girlfriend's item, so also her address. Boldness. Unheard of. Mistakes happen, but for a package to be mixed up, I find it quite clumsy of a big chain like Elbenwald!
And the prices, luckily we ordered early enough. 
Item will be canceled and returned!
Comment: Hi Timo, unfortunately, I cannot clearly assign an order to you. Please contact our customer support with your order number, together we will surely find a solution. Best regards from Elbenwald!

Title: Schlichte Eleganz
Content:
The Abernathy wand is kept simple yet elegant, fitting for a MACUSA employee. 
For me, the handle is a bit too short.
But I'm not the standard here! ;-)
I use swords like Ice (Eddard Stark) or Anduril more as a one-handed weapon. 

Everything is neatly crafted and painted. 

One star deducted because the handle is made from regular plastic (not the Cold-Cast method). This makes the handle part considerably lighter, so the wand feels a bit top-heavy and doesn't quite sit as well in the hand. 
Still, a very beautiful wand that I really like in terms of design! 
Definitely worth buying!
Comment: Hi Nils, I'm sorry you're not completely satisfied. Our comparison piece is entirely made of Cold Cast and is also not top-heavy. The best thing to do is to send us a message through our customer support, together we'll surely find a solution. Best regards from Elbenwald!

Title: Fusselt fürchterlich.
Content:
I had ordered this blanket first and was initially thrilled.
Great look and wonderfully cozy. Maybe a bit too thin, doesn't warm up sooo well.

However, the effect the blanket had on my sofa snuggle pants (black cotton joggers) was terrible.
Just covering up was enough, and the pants were completely covered in lint from top to bottom.
Elbenwald was as accommodating as always and immediately exchanged the blanket for "The Marauder's Map." Almost identical blanket with a Harry Potter motif. This one was ordered by my wife and hardly shed lint at first.
We've had the blankets for almost a year now, and both of them are shedding lint like crazy.
We find the lint not only on our clothes but now all over the house. Now it's enough despite the great look; both blankets will be replaced. The lint shedding is not normal; we've had other blankets before and never such a spectacle.
Too bad!
Comment: Hi Christian, I'm truly sorry this happened and it shouldn't have. Please contact our customer support, together we'll surely find a solution. Best wishes from Elbenwald!

Title: Fusselt fürchterlich.
Content:
The blankets have been in use since March 2018.
The first impression was pure enthusiasm. Great look and super fluffy.
Maybe a bit too thin, but so large that you can use them double, so it's okay.
I initially had the same blanket with a "Lord of the Rings" motif, but I immediately exchanged it for this one because the other one was already shedding like crazy from the start. My wife immediately ordered this blanket, and it was initially okay.
By now, both of our blankets are shedding so much that we've found the fluff even on the third floor of our house. It's just annoying—you hardly dare to go out in your jogging pants because the sofa blankets are covered with fluff all over.
We've washed and dried the blankets multiple times in the hope of stopping the shedding, but it's all in vain.
We will replace the blankets because this is not normal. We had other blankets before, and none of them shed, neither before nor after washing.

I can unfortunately only advise against buying them, unless you want to use them as wall decor or a day blanket.
Comment: Hi Christian, I'm truly sorry this happened and it shouldn't have. Please reach out to our customer support, together we'll surely find a solution. Best wishes from Elbenwald!

Title: Tinkerbell
Content:
I ordered a ladies M and thought, well, something will come of it.

Title: Wie erwartet
Content:
The bookmark is nicely sturdy, made from thicker cardboard. It should withstand heavy use and hold up well. The pen looks just like the product photo. The pen itself is very heavy, but most of the weight comes from the cap. I inquired with customer service whether the refill is replaceable, as I don't want to spend much money on a pen that can only be used once. I was told that it is possible. I just don't know how and am afraid of breaking the pen in the process.

But overall, I am very satisfied!

Title: Geht der Stab kaputt
Content:
I would like to ask another question: it was said that if you swing the wand too hard, it will break.

I would be happy to receive an answer from Elbenwald or anyone who already has the wand.
Comment: Hi Lucius, our wand expert Chris says that the wand won't break from simple waving. However, it's not necessarily recommended for show duels. Best wishes from the Elvenwood!

Title: Super Preis-Leistung, schnelle Lieferung und netter Service
Content:
I was looking for an apron for baking/cooking and as a GOT fan, I ordered this one. I'm totally thrilled with Elbenwald, super-fast delivery, it arrived within 3 days. The apron is made of high-quality, dense fabric and fits me (1.63 m) perfectly. Very long ties, so it's probably suitable for every stature. Nice print, the image is not exaggerated. And for the price, it's really very good.
Of course, the customer service is also great, I love these cool and creative notification emails :)
It's a pity, however, that it's not possible to order on invoice (I've had this problem before).
Overall, I'm very satisfied, I'll gladly order here again :)
Comment: Hi Nemeria, thank you very much for your praise and your tip. Actually, you should be able to order from us without any problems on invoice. Best wishes from Elbenwald!

Title: Ganz nett, aber mit gravierendem Fehler
Content:
The book is quite nicely made, mainly consisting of pictures with little text, and is quite beautiful in itself. 
The information in the book is rather superficial, nothing that you wouldn't already have known beforehand. All well and good. BUT: Has the writer only seen Fantastic Beasts but never watched or read Harry Potter? Otherwise, I can't explain the following error: "The Elder Wand is one of the Deathly Hallows [...] The Philosopher's Stone and the Invisibility Cloak complete the legendary trio." Since when does the Philosopher's Stone belong to the Deathly Hallows??? Honestly, maybe the manufacturers should hire a few Potterheads to check their products for errors before they are sold. I would also volunteer for this job. ;) 
Otherwise, the book is really nicely made.
Comment: Hi Mrs. Potter, the author must not have been paying attention, and a few elves took the opportunity to play a joke or a quill developed a mind of its own. :-) Best wishes from the Elvenwood!

Title: Viel zu klein
Content:
The shirt is of super quality! Soft and the print is beautiful!
Normally I wear size 50-52, maximum 54, in Swedish fashion stores for women. Since I thought these shirts might be cut smaller, I ordered size XXXL (according to the size chart, this corresponds to about size 56-58). Unfortunately, the shirt was much too small and especially much too short. It only reaches just above the waistband. My mother (normal size 38-40) fit the shirt quite well. Since she doesn't want it, I still have to return it.
How about offering me tailored sizes or some of the popular shirts also in plus sizes...so I have to switch to oversized men's shirts, which are always too tight in the chest area...too bad. I really struggle to find suitable HP merchandise.
Best regards
Comment: Hi Katrin, I honestly feel sorry that you're not satisfied. The size chart is more of a guideline for the shirts, which can be worn by both men and women. Since our Girlie shirts vary due to different cuts, converting them to standard sizes is not quite so straightforward. Thank you for your understanding and best regards from the Elbenwald!

Title: Aller guten Dinge sind bekanntlich 3, aber nicht bei mir mehr.
Content:
Sorry Elbenwald, but the 3rd box will unfortunately be my last one, and I will explain my reasons. I am once again very impressed with the quality. But it cannot be that I receive so many duplicate items from 3 Elbenwald boxes, especially since I always order one box per month.

Newt Scamander Notebook in red (3x)
Tony Stark Whiskey Glass Set (2x)
Rick & Morty Mug (2x)
Fantastic Beasts Puzzle (2x)
Platform 9 3/4 T-Shirt (2x)

You really should implement a traffic light system so that customers can see the status of things, when it makes sense to order another Elbenwald box again. I will definitely not order another box after this failure. 1-2 items duplicated is okay, but the entire content duplicated (after research, the March content is the same as the January content).
Comment: Hi Thomas, I honestly feel sorry that you're not satisfied. Our boxes are regularly packed with new content. However, we cannot influence which box variant arrives at your place. It is just as much a surprise for us as it is for you. Thank you for your understanding and best regards from the Elbenwald!

Title: Hier stimmt Alles
Content:
Honestly, I don't even know where to start... with the beauty of the sword, the fast shipping, or the more than witty confirmation/notification emails.
One thing is certain: Everything here is spot on.
The sword not only looks extremely epic, but it feels that way too. The weight also speaks for the high-quality material used here. Together with the wall mount, it's simply a real eye-catcher.
But one thing I must particularly note: The order confirmation email......I have never read a more entertaining one in my life. Generally, everything I've seen here so far was just good. Not to mention the sword.
However, there is one thing that would still interest me.
Is there a possibility that you could get Herugrim back in your shop? I would really like to be able to call this piece my own.
Otherwise, I can only say that I would order here again at any time.
You guys are a really cool forest^^
Comment: Hi Julian, thanks first of all for your praise! Unfortunately, the sword Herugrim is sold out and we won't be getting it in again. I'm really sorry. :-( Best wishes from the Elvenwood!

Title: Ravenclaw/Hufflepuff
Content:
I don't know what everyone always has with Gryffindor and Slytherin... I mean, Hogwarts has 4 houses, and I think I'm speaking for all Hufflepuffs and Ravenclaws here: We want equality! Where are the blue and yellow hats?!
(And while we're at it: Colors for Ravenclaw: blue and BRONZE; Ravenclaw's crest: EAGLE)

Sorry, but I just had to vent a bit :)
Otherwise, elvenwald is always top-notch, and yes, I know—you have to stick to the movies...
Being a Ravenclaw isn't always easy, you know (:
Comment:
Hey Jenny,
I totally understand you. We are also trying to cover as many houses as possible, but unfortunately, this is not always possible. Especially when we don't produce things ourselves, we are dependent on the favor of suppliers. When it comes to colors and the coat of arms, we are also bound by licensing requirements - it's just the way it is in the movie that the raven is in the coat of arms. I hope you will still find what you're looking for with us. :-) Best wishes from the Elvenwood!

Title: Vegan ?
Content: Hello, I would like to celebrate a Harry Potter birthday and serve something from this cookbook to my guests. One of my guests is vegan... is there a vegan recipe?
Comment: Hey Heike, many recipes are prepared with butter, milk, and eggs. However, these ingredients can be easily replaced with vegan products from the supermarket, such as vegan butter, margarine, and soy milk. As an egg substitute in baked goods, you can use bananas, applesauce, or peanut butter. Portioning specifically for egg substitutes can be easily found on the internet. :-) Best wishes from the Elbe Forest!

Title: Müllsack getarnt unter Kostümlabel
Content:
I love, love Elbenwald. Elbenwald has always stood for pristine merchandise and awesome quality for me!

But this is a real imposition. I'm a cosplayer and I've already drastically lowered my expectations—it was only supposed to serve as a Halloween gag. But this is really... it's an official Elbenwald product—unfortunately. I'm wavering between M and L—and since I usually have tight experiences with latex, I ordered L. So—the dress looks like a big trash bag in flash photography. The bat is sewn crooked—the dress is WAY too big—the online image is completely misleading. The belt is made of cheap hard rubber held together by two strings—the cape is a whisper of nothing. I'm very willing to trust the Elbenwald team, I've never been disappointed before... but this—wow, I'm shocked at how terrible this item is, while I usually marvel when I stroll into the Frankfurt Elbenwald...

Not recommended.
Make your own costumes—order a pair of lederhosen and a corset or invest a good 300 euros. Because this... is a nightmare. Okay for little girls—but I wouldn't even want to see my five-year-old cousin in it...

Too bad—the image is top-notch, the costume more than a flop. :c
Comment: Hi Maren, I'm truly sorry that the costume didn't meet your expectations. Please send us an email to our customer support. Together, we'll surely find a quick solution. Best wishes from Elbenwald!

If you're looking for a tie that should be as authentic as possible, then this tie is the right choice. :-) Optionally, you can also order the other models and see which one fits your uniform best. The ties you don't like, you can send back to us free of charge. Best wishes from the Elvenwood and thank you for your praise!

That was already very disappointing, because there was no option to choose between a girly or men's shirt. Unfortunately, the shirt is now completely useless for us.
The contents are quite nice, but absolutely not worth the €80, the value is significantly lower. I also did not expect a product with the Elbenwald logo, as this is neither available in the shop nor does it have any special value.

Title: Zur Zauberstab-Bemalung.. :'D
Content:
I bought the awesome wand on my last school trip, when I went to an Elven Forest store for the first time in my life on the first day. And the wand is mega, I love it! *-*
But I have a little question, maybe you can answer it. :'D
When I look at the wand closely in daylight, it always looks like it's not properly painted with the brown color, you can see a lot of "rusty brown" or something similar through it, and it shines more as if the color wasn't applied correctly or as if it's wearing off from constant handling. But when I look at the pictures on the internet and also directly on this site, I can see exactly the same discolorations as mine has. Does that mean the paint job is intentional and is supposed to be like that? So that it looks "used"? xD
I'm kind of worried that by constantly holding the awesome wand, I might rub off the dark brown color, making it discolored and shiny everywhere.. :'D

But overall, the wand is still mega! *-*
Comment: Hey Silverbolt, actually, all wands are hand-painted and may vary slightly in color from model to model, making them small unique pieces. The color differences are intentional, so the wand looks a bit more rustic. :-) Best wishes from the Elven Forest!

Title: Reinfall
Content: A very beautiful bracelet, but not suitable for everyday use. I immediately took off the hat because it was too annoying under jackets and kept getting caught everywhere. Luckily, because what REALLY annoys me is that after just a few days of wearing it, the clasp on the crest started to weaken (it wasn't quite right even when I bought it) and I then unfortunately lost the pendant—I was devastated. Shortly after, the purple glass also started to fall out of the flower pendant. I still wear the bracelet, though, without anything on it, and I repurposed the hat as a necklace so I wouldn't lose it too. Actually a nice bracelet, but not worth the price, and unfortunately, you can't buy this crest separately.
Comment: Hey Hanna, we honestly apologize that the bracelet didn't meet your expectations. Please write us an email to our customer support and report the issues with your bracelet. Together, we will surely find a quick solution. Best regards from the Elbenwald!

Title: Sehr schöner Cardigan, Produktbeschreibung allerdings nicht korrekt.
Content: I received the cardigan today and was a bit disappointed at first because it's not 100% lambswool as advertised, but a mix of 80% lambswool and 20% polyamide. I also already own the Gryffindor sweater (100% lambswool) from the same manufacturer and am very satisfied with the quality. However, the cardigan also makes a high-quality and good impression, and since the garment is more strained by opening and closing the buttons, it probably makes sense to mix in some polyamide to increase its durability. I hope I will enjoy the cardigan as long as I have enjoyed the sweater, because I also really like it, it keeps me warm, and it's well made.
Comment: Hi Regina, thank you very much for your tip. We have already contacted the manufacturer and will update the material information promptly. We hope you still have a lot of fun with your cardigan. :-) Best wishes from the Elbenwald!

Title: Doch kein original?
Content:
Hello, how come the scarves here are advertised as original film scarves... Even though they don't have fringes like in the movie. Something doesn't seem right and I would appreciate clarification. Could it be that the scarf from Madame Malkin's is the original one for 129 euros?
I would like to give an original as a gift and not a replica or anything similar.
Comment: Hi Dennis, the scarves come from the official prop supplier of the Harry Potter films. A more original original will be hard to find. Why the slight fringes are missing, however, is also a mystery to us. We strongly suspect Nargel. Best wishes from the Elvenwood!

Title: ... Sonst wäre es wohl mein Lieblingsshirt
Content:
The T-shirt is really nice and the fabric feels good on the skin. I was over the moon when I received it as a gift a few weeks ago.

However, part of the print has already faded after the first wash, even though I washed it properly. The print has become brittle and is now crumbling away. I still wear the shirt, because, as I said, I really like it, but in the foreseeable future, the print will probably be completely gone. (which I find extremely unfortunate)

If it weren't for this issue, it would probably be my favorite shirt.

Title: Naja
Content: First of all, I am a huge LOTR fan and own quite a few fan items. I have this bottle twice, as I bought it for myself and then received it as a Christmas gift again, since the giver didn't know I already had it. What immediately caught my attention is that both bottles are different (the bottom has a different shape and the lid is also slightly different). The design is great, although the image on one bottle is more matte and on the second one it is glossy. Unfortunately, the second bottle was missing the sealing ring under the suction opening, so it couldn't be used at all. (No, you can't lose it, as the suction part is very difficult to remove). Thanks to a handy man and a well-equipped workshop, we had a suitable ring at home. So far, so good. The biggest flaw I see is the lack of tightness - it's practically non-existent. As soon as you tilt it, it leaks (not exactly great when you suddenly realize that the hanging bag is dripping because the bottle inside is obviously not always transported upright). Another flaw is that the seal begins to mold after the shortest time. (I rinsed it with warm water after each use since you shouldn't put it in the dishwasher, but that's not enough; you also need to pop out the sealing ring in the lid - which only works with a toothpick or similar tool (be careful, the seal tends to tear easily). All in all, if you need a nice bottle to look at, then okay, but functionally it's a total no-go, sorry.
Comment: Hi Claudia, thank you very much for your detailed feedback. These defects should not occur and we will check the product. Please write us an email to our customer support. My colleagues will be happy to assist you with the return or exchange. Best wishes from Elbenwald!

Title: Coole Idee mit leider zuviele Mängeln
Content:
I really liked the idea of being surprised, so much so that I even tried it twice, but unfortunately, the box had various significant flaws.

1. There is always a T-shirt included. For which you can and should specify a size. Why is no cut or gender asked for here? What am I supposed to do with a T-shirt as a man with a women's cut and maybe vice versa if I should specify my size beforehand? That's really frustrating in the end. (Especially if you notice it much later...)

2. The promised value of 80€ was not achieved in one of my cases. This simply must not happen if you advertise this on the website. Although the customer service, which was consistently friendly and helpful, did assist here, it still costs unnecessary time and nerves.

3. This is certainly debatable, but why does it always have to include a Funko Pop figure? In my opinion, these are not only useless but also quite ugly, regardless of the genre.

4. As has been noted frequently in the comments here, it is not clear whether and when a new box is in stock or when you can order again. Add a number or a code to your boxes. Then it could be checked or indicated by the customer themselves or by your employees which boxes have already been sent to the respective customers or are currently in stock.

Overall, despite a very cool idea, it's very frustrating.
Comment: Hi SB, we honestly apologize that your surprise box didn't meet your expectations. If you really don't want to keep any of the products, please send us an email to our customer support. My colleagues will assist you with the return of the entire box. Best regards from Elbenwald!

Title: Leider nicht wie in den Büchern beschrieben
Content: I am sure the product is made of high-quality materials or at least good, as the other reviews say, however, I am bothered by the fact that it does not match the description in the books. In the books, the heraldic animal is described as an eagle, even though the name naturally suggests a raven. Additionally, it gives the impression that the house colors are blue and silver, which is also incorrect. They are blue and bronze. Even though this sounds like nitpicking on the highest level, it simply bothers me that they do not pay attention to how it is actually described. This is of course not a unique problem with Elbenwald, but it should still be addressed. Maybe something will change at some point.
Comment:
Hello dear Ravenclaw,
as a loyal advocate of our house, I can understand your displeasure. To explain: The crest and also the house colors were altered for the movies. Since we officially sell licensed film merchandise, the colors and also the crest animal on our Ravenclaw products are modeled after the design templates of the movies.
Best wishes from the Elvenwood!

Title: Leider nicht wie in den Büchern beschrieben
Content: I am confident that the product is made of high-quality materials, or at least good, as the other reviews say, however, I am bothered by the fact that it does not match the description in the books. In the books, the heraldic animal is described as an eagle, even though the name naturally suggests a raven. Additionally, it gives the impression that the house colors are blue and silver, which is also incorrect. They are blue and bronze. Even though this may sound like complaining on the highest level, it simply bothers me that they do not pay attention to how it is actually described. This is of course not a unique problem with Elbenwald, but it should still be addressed. Maybe something will change at some point.
Comment: Hello dear Ravenclaw, as a loyal advocate of our house, I can understand your displeasure. To explain: The crest and also the house colors were altered for the movies. Since we officially sell licensed film merchandise, the colors and also the crest animal on our Ravenclaw products are modeled after the design templates of the movies. Best regards from the Elvenwood!

Title: Retrospektive
Content:
Hello, dear Elbenwald team,

I love browsing through your new releases in the hope of finding such treasures! I've been noticing for a while now that you mainly promote and glorify mainstream "nerd topics" or current trends (ES, Batman's 80th). Of course, HP, LotR, and Marvel are very popular, but I've always admired you for not necessarily offering the usual merchandise... But nowadays, anyone who has watched the movies in the above areas can call themselves a fan. It's a shame and a bit embarrassing that the true hardcore fans from the very beginning of the HP/Marvel/LotR universe are lumped together with them. It really doesn't make you feel special as a "nerd" anymore.

Well, long story short, sometimes, though rarely, you surprise me with things like the Digimon T-shirt, and a little hope begins to grow. Hard to believe it's been 20 years already :( 
I really hope this shirt won't be the only item you have for Digimon fans, as some of your A-Z brands only have one or two items (see Sonic or The Division from the gaming industry). *sheepish look*

It would also be great to see another milestone in video game history besides the mustachioed plumber: Final Fantasy!!! Painfully and yet absolutely current since VI here as well.

But these are just suggestions. I'm just happy that you've taken a very small step into the almost retro scene of the late 90s with Digimon. It surprises me quite a bit, as I often heard the anime's opening song in your stores but never saw any merchandise...? :/

Sorry for rambling, a bit more came out than planned. Thumbs up and ten points in advance for Slytherin... uh, I meant Elbenwald, for the Digimon T-shirt. Preferably in men's cut, as there were also a few fans to be found ;)

Yours, MetalGreymon
Comment: Hi MetalGreymon, thank you very much for your detailed feedback. I have passed your comments on to my colleagues. :-) Best regards from the Elven Forest!

Title: Supertolle Jacke .....aber...
Content: The jacket was a gift for my husband for last Christmas. The jacket itself is great, the leather is soft, and the Shadowwolf logo on the back and front is awesome!! My husband was also very happy with it and loves wearing the jacket. BUT: When my husband tried on the jacket, we noticed that the inner zipper was broken. So I had to take the jacket to our local tailor to get a new zipper, which cost me an additional 25 €. A few weeks later, my husband noticed that the right outer jacket pocket had a hole on the inside! So I will also have to get that fixed by the tailor soon! So, I think a jacket that costs 199 € should at least be delivered without any damage. But now I have additional costs for replacing the zipper, and then I also have to get the hole in the pocket fixed, which means more additional costs. That's the only reason I can't give a full 10 points. Otherwise, the jacket is really just super cool...
Comment: Hi Marion, I understand your frustration. For the price, the product should be flawless and not incur any additional costs. However, we want to point out that you could have contacted our customer support at any time to exchange the jacket. Please don't hesitate to reach out to us in the future if you are dissatisfied with your product. We'll help where we can! :-) Best regards from Elbenwald!

I'm really sorry! :-( Best wishes from the Elvenwood!

Title: Vor dem Kauf... noch ein paar Fragen
Content:
Hello dear Elbenwald team or map users,

before I purchase this map, I would like to know a few details. Does the map show the four common rooms, the Great Hall, Dumbledore's office, the offices of the other teachers, the kitchen, dungeons, courtyards, Filch's office, and the classrooms for the various subjects (the Room of Requirement should not be visible, as also described in the book;))? Does the map show "just" Hogwarts or also Hogsmeade, the school grounds (including Hagrid's hut and the greenhouses), the lake, the Forbidden Forest, and the Quidditch pitch? Many have written in the comments that the map is detailed, while others say that certain things like the Great Hall are missing. So what is it? I would really like to buy the map, but I don't know if it's really worth it if the things mentioned above are not visible on it.

Thank you in advance,
Seraphina Piquery
Comment: Hi Seraphina, unfortunately, I couldn't find the common rooms or the large hall on the map either. Maybe I'm just a Muggle and most of the magic of the map remains hidden to me. In fact, only the castle is depicted here. The Forbidden Forest is hinted at, but Hogsmeade and the Quidditch pitch are not included. Personally, I am thrilled by the abundance of information the map provides. Courtyards, classrooms, towers, secret passages. There is a lot to discover here. :-) Best wishes from the Elf Forest!

Title: Zuerst...
Content:
Honestly: at first, I was disappointed.
On the one hand, the packaging says "Harry Potter Broken Wand," and there's a bright spot that I thought didn't belong there. Also, the end of the handle is cut off flat (which is also the case with my Ron wand (in the store, it was the same with Harry's, but not with my Harry wand)).
However, after longer examination and checking on the Elbenwald website, the bright spot (which does belong there!!!) no longer bothers me, and I don't use the nameplate anyway, and the box is standing with the lid at the back (so I'm not particularly bothered that it doesn't say "Snatcher Wand" on it).
Overall, it's now one of my favorite wands! (I have it with me right now while writing this review ;) )
It feels (at least to me) very good in the hand, and the decoration is just so great!!!

But I have one question: Why is the end of some wands so flat?
Comment: Hi Harry, we suspect artistic freedom on the part of the wand maker. :-) Best wishes from the Elvenwood!

Title: Bei Merlins Bart!
Content:
Nice design. Unfortunately, it's a shame that no one is in Hogwarts.
Additionally, the quality is really questionable.

- The pieces are A) too thin and B) many pieces fit into different gaps (which is not always noticeable in the design, whether it's currently in the wrong place)

- the template is tiny (about 15x25cm, I would estimate)

- the puzzle is also very loose overall. The pieces don't fit together nicely.

- there is basically only one shape for the pieces.
Either rotated horizontally or vertically.

Definitely not a purchase recommendation. Then I'd rather get another one from Ravensburger. At least everything is correct there.

Too bad...
Comment: Hi Jennifer, I'm truly sorry that you're unhappy with the quality of the puzzle. Please send us an email to our customer support. Together, we'll surely find a quick solution. Best regards from Elbenwald!

Title: NICHT Spülmaschinengeeignet
Content: The glasses are NOT dishwasher safe as stated by Elbenwald! After unpacking, they went straight into the dishwasher. Title: Schön, aber...
Content: I saw the bag in Nuremberg at the Elbenwaldstore and immediately fell in love with it. That's why I took it for 50 € and put it on right away. My phone and wallet found space in it, even though the undetectable extension charm wasn't included. I was also very enthusiastic on the second day. Still. However, the next day, it had its first damages at the twisted fabrics: some gray fabric is peeking out, at one spot it's no longer twisted, and a few red threads are sticking out. I was very disappointed because from now on I could only put the bag on the shelf, as I feared that the bag might break further if used. Actually, I wanted to use this bag to go to the city or shopping. I think it's stupid that the bag looks so nice but also breaks so quickly. And 50€ it certainly wasn't worth. And every time I look in the closet, I don't enjoy the bag, but I'm sad.
Comment: Hi, we honestly feel sorry about that. If you still have the receipt, you can gladly exchange the bag with us. It's also sufficient to send a message to our customer support. Together, we will surely find a quick solution. :-) Best regards from Elbenwald!

Title: Rabe oder Adler
Content: The pillow itself is very nice, but what I find strange is that the Ravenclaws don't have the eagle as their emblem. One moment it's a raven, then it's an eagle, even though the raven makes more sense from the name. While the raven is associated with intelligence, the eagle stands for wisdom. What is the official emblem now, I believe it's the raven from the book. I would be curious to know what is correct now.
Comment: Hi Allegra, the answer is actually: Both, sort of. In the Harry Potter books, the emblem of Ravenclaw is an eagle. However, in the movies, the eagle was changed to a raven. I think this was done to make the name Ravenclaw more symbolic. Since we officially offer licensed Harry Potter film merchandise, the raven is also the focus for us, not the eagle. :-) Best wishes from the Elvenwood!

Title: Anduril/Narsil
Content: The sword is really beautiful. Just as a gift, it's top-notch. However, what I wonder is, aren't Narsil and Anduril the same sword? Why then do they have 1. two different names and 2. why is Anduril significantly longer than Narsil?
Comment: Hi Naphil, Narsil and Anduril are only conditionally the same sword. Elendil wielded Narsil in battle against Sauron, but the blade shattered. The broken pieces of the sword were later forged into a new sword, which is Anduril. Due to the new forging technique, it is quite possible that Anduril's blade is longer than the original blade of Narsil. :-) Best wishes from the Elvenwood!

Title: Blue Meanies?
Content:
When I saw the cover, I thought it was a joke! Whoever wants to honor a classic with a jubilee edition—and the publisher is right to do so—should not rely on the content alone, but also offer a cover that makes the mouth and mind water.

What Klett-Cotta is doing HERE is, at best, incomprehensible... A bird with a snake(?) tongue—whatever book this may be from, in Tolkien's entire world, this creature is not even remotely present. And then I wonder why the hippie era with a revival of the Blue Meanies and other characters from "Yellow Submarine" was used for this work.

Terribly botched, my dear publisher! But really!
That Klett-Cotta can do better is shown by the lesser-known works of Tolkien in their portfolio.
Please send the cover designer and everyone who approved this to the desert!
Actually, zero stars... appalling!

For those who don't already have it, the 50th anniversary of the book is a welcome occasion to buy it—but please choose a different edition!
Comment: Hi Bernhard, the cover is the original cover of the first German edition from 1969. :-) Best wishes from the Elvenwood!

Title: Voller Erfolg
Content:
I simply LOVE this MN protection! Not only does it look great, but it also gave me an unforgettable flirt on the bus. The 5-year-old behind me was completely fascinated by it, then sat next to me and asked why I was smiling so beautifully :D Afterwards, the little charmer gave me an apple, waved to me at my stop, and asked for a blown kiss - simply sweet!

Apart from that, it's comfortable to wear (even as an adult...) and you still get plenty of air. At the end of the day, just give it a quick boil or throw it in the washing machine - perfect. You really can't ask for more from an everyday mask! Thanks

Title: Leider echt unbequem
Content:
I had chosen these shoes because they simply matched my cosplay outfit, the shoes arrived very quickly and the financing allowed me to pick them up immediately, I tried them on right away, they fit perfectly.... BUT:
These shoes are by no means intended for longer walks! The rigid cap behind the heel constantly rubbed against my heel and other parts of my foot, I had painful blisters everywhere on my foot, some of which even burst, getting out of the shoes is also a struggle, all laces undone and yet I had to pull like a world champion, right after that I saw how the artificial leather at the tip already started to peel off and become rough, you can already see the first signs of damage even though I walked in normal areas, so the shoes are perfect for a few wears or for people who only stand, unfortunately, the break-in period didn't help, either the material is too stable to stretch or my feet are too small even though the shoes fit perfectly and I still have some room.... Too bad!
Comment: Hi Philipp, we are truly sorry about that. Please send us an email to our customer support. Together, we will surely find a quick solution. Best wishes from Elbenwald!

Title: Vorsicht! Die schmecken nach dem, was drauf steht!
Content:
I received these things for my birthday. I didn't know they would taste like what's listed on the packaging: including soap, earwax, vomit, etc.

Maybe there should be a warning on the packaging!

Hi Oliver,
we are sorry that the beans did not agree with you. The wizard world has a somewhat extravagant taste when it comes to sweets. But at least one thing can be relied upon: When wizards say "all flavors," they mean it. Of course, this does not always suit everyone's taste. As a small warning, we have indicated the flavors in our product description.
Best wishes from the Elvenwood! :-)

Title: Sieht super aus, aber am Stoff gibt es ordentliche Mängel
Content:
A great pair of pants in itself, which looks good, is comfortable, and can certainly be worn not only at the medieval market.

If you disregard the funny sizes that the other reviewers have already described, there is, at least for me, a problem: I ordered the pants about 2 weeks ago and they arrived quickly, but now there are already two relatively large tears in the seam at the upper thighs between the legs. The fabric appears to be well-made everywhere on the pants, but at this spot, it is much rougher and the tear in the seam looks so frayed that one must speak of poor workmanship at this point, no matter how hard one tries to avoid it.

Well, luckily I can sew, even if I probably won't order here again anytime soon. It's a shame, really.
Comment: Hi Gerrit, we are truly sorry about that. Please send us an email to our customer support. Our helper elves always find a solution. :-) Best wishes from the Elven Forest!

Title: Schrecklich
Content:
Perhaps the worst puzzle I've ever puzzled.

As already written by other reviewers, pieces fit in dozens of different places and the mistakes are sometimes impossible to spot. The cuts also feel extremely jagged. My puzzle partner and I were faced with the task several times and then forced ourselves to self-flagellation. We also missed a piece, but that's probably the least of the problems with this puzzle.

All in all, the puzzle symbolically represents 2020. Premium, I imagine, is something entirely different.

Title: Negativ überrascht
Content: Unfortunately, I cannot agree with the overwhelmingly very positive reviews here. The material and workmanship quality is very mediocre. The casting edges are very noticeable and in some places there are still casting residues, which suggest a worn-out casting mold. The plastic used is soft and does not feel particularly high-quality. Lastly, the magic wand delivered to me is also crooked! All in all, I might have paid 10€ for it... AT MOST! But certainly not 40€. I must say, I am quite disappointed.
Comment: Hi Alex, we honestly apologize that you are not satisfied with your wand. Please write us an email to our customer support. Our helpful elves will gladly assist you with the return or exchange. Best wishes from the Elbenwald!

Title: Schaumstoffteile eher ausreichend bis mangelhaft
Content: The cardboard puzzle is beautiful and challenging. The pieces were good, with one or two minor flaws that were present but tolerable. The foam puzzle, unfortunately, has a different quality. Although all the pieces were present, many had white crease edges due to shipping and the "folds" in the bag. Some pieces had corners already torn off, and when inserting the mountains and buildings, there were sometimes small tears in the paper due to slightly inaccurate positioning. It looks great from a distance, but up close, you can see the white flaws or tears. Very disappointing actually, not worth €50 or more and far from a 10-star rating. :(
Comment: Hi Dennis, we honestly feel sorry about this. Please write us an email to our customer support. Together, we will surely find a quick solution. :-) Best regards from Elbenwald!

Title: Sehr enttäuschend
Content:
A bag with the map of Middle-earth! What a wonderful idea. As a big fan of both Lord of the Rings and maps in general, I naturally had to have the bag.
I received it as a birthday present right away. I unwrapped the gift, and my reaction was, to put it bluntly—disappointment at first sight.
As impressive as the pictures look, the bag is unimpressive in reality.
The map of Middle-earth is almost invisible. Unfortunately, it just looks like the bag has dirt stains—and it probably does by now. Because the carrying straps don't hold. The bag keeps falling to the ground unless you secure it with a few knots, which make the bag even less appealing.
What a shame, what a shame, what a shame! Such a good idea—such poor execution.
Comment: Hi Tasariel, we are truly sorry about that. Please send us an email to our customer support. Together, we will surely find a solution! Best wishes from Elbenwald!

Title: Leider nach einem Tag defekt
Content:
At first, I was absolutely thrilled with this stylish picture frame. It is relatively heavy and partially detailed.

However, I unfortunately had to realize that the price is absolutely not justified. The back panel is merely a piece of cardboard glued on, which completely detached from mine after just one day. I'm glad the picture frame was only standing on a shelf and not hanging on the wall. I don't even want to imagine what would have happened if this heavy picture frame had fallen (e.g., onto my cats). For €30 (which is already a hefty price for such an industrially manufactured picture frame), I did not expect to receive a picture frame that falls apart after just one day.

Very disappointing.

Title: Super Jacke welche aber leider extrem klein ausfällt.
Content:
I got this jacket for both myself and my girlfriend.
Generally, it's almost a flawless jacket.
The only issue is the size assignment.
L feels like S on me (178,95 kg). I'm aware that I need to fit into L again. But I fear there's a difference of up to 3 sizes here, whereas I had no problems with the Pollunder and Quidditch pullover. S for my wife feels like XS (at the hips). Since my girlfriend is almost 90/60/90, S as unisex should fit. Unfortunately, it's not the case at the bottom closure. Also too tight here. We then tried L, and there was a bit more room at the bottom. But everything was saggy at the top. We're now trying size M for my wife. For me, it's probably not going to work anymore. Unfortunately, all sizes above L are now sold out. Hope there's a restock =(
Otherwise, it's a very nice jacket. Just order and try 1-2 sizes larger.
Comment: Hi NioVelvet, thank you very much for your detailed feedback. We will also be restocking the larger sizes soon. However, the jackets will likely only arrive with us next year. I honestly feel sorry about that. :-( Best wishes from Elbenwald!

Title: Leider enttäuschend :(
Content:
First of all, I have to say that I am generally a big fan of Elbenwald clothing items. Unfortunately, I had a more than negative experience with this shirt.

For size 2XL (I wanted to use it as a particularly loose shirt for sleeping), it is cut especially small. This would still be tolerable if the seam didn't immediately tear at the first try-on on the left sleeve. Very poor seam work - it can be easily repaired, so no big problem, but still annoying with a brand-new shirt. Maybe it's a Monday product, who knows.

The print, however, is super beautiful and detailed. Hopefully it will withstand the wash *fingers crossed*.

If trade weren't closed from Tuesday due to Corona, and I didn't have the chance to visit my shop beforehand, I would have preferred to exchange it.

Unfortunately, my first negative experience with Elbenwald products. Therefore, no purchase recommendation from me :-/
Comment: Hi Katrin, we are truly sorry about that. Please write us an email to our customer support. There will surely be a solution. :-) Best regards from Elbenwald!

Title: Nicht empfehlenswert
Content:
The ring itself is nice to look at, but if you look closer, you can see that the braided pattern on the sides has been very roughly, one might even say cheaply, processed. 
Moreover, the gemstone, which appears to be a deeper shade of red in the picture, is actually closer to a light red or even pink in reality. I find this to be the biggest disappointment, as it is the gemstone Narya that gives the ring its character, and more effort should have been put into its processing. 

As a ring for everyday use, I would advise a fan to refrain from buying it.
Comment: Hi Marcel, thank you very much for your feedback. We will review and adjust the product photos. If the ring really doesn't suit you at all, you can of course return it to us here. Best wishes from Elbenwald!

Content: I have a size 63 ring, but unfortunately, they don't have that size. Which size should I take instead, 62 or 64?

I hope we were able to help you a little and send our best wishes from Elbenwald.

Title: Ich träum ich wär in Hogwarts...
Content:
This pajama set is awesome!! Ever since I got it (a few days ago), I've been wearing it every night. Plus, I also wear it in the evenings, paired with my fluffy Slytherin crest bathrobe, to snuggle on the couch!! It's very comfortable and doesn't constrict at all while sleeping. The size is perfect (best size L). It makes me dream of Hogwarts...

By the way: Could a man also wear this pajama set? My husband is a die-hard Gryffindor fan, and I'd love to order him the red Gryffindor plaid pajamas, but I'm not sure if they would fit him??

Warm regards from a loyal fan, and I wish you all good health,
a lovely Christmas, and a happy New Year!

Marion
Comment:
Hello Marion,
we are very pleased that you like the pajamas so much. Due to the sizes, the pajamas are more geared towards women. But yes, a man can also wear the pajama suit. You would have to estimate whether it might fit him based on the size. He can try it on, as the size range goes from XS to XL. Best regards from the Elbenwald.

Title: Frage zum Zauberstab
Content: The wand is very, very beautiful and intricately crafted. I still have one question, though. Is the wand suitable for "duels" or rather not? U. A. w. g.                                              Kind regards! Jamie
Comment:
Hello Jamie,
we are very pleased that the magic wand suits you and you like it. As long as you wave and swish the magic wand, nothing will happen to it. However, since it is made from a special resin mixture, it is possible that if it bangs against a hard surface or is hit somewhere, it may chip or splinter. Inside, however, there is still a small metal rod that makes it more stable. I hope this answer was of some help to you.
Best wishes from the Elven Forest.

Title: Bitte auch endlich mal die fülligen Frauen ab Gr.50 beachten!!
Content:
The sweater looks absolutely beautiful in the picture and in real life. Unfortunately, overweight people, like with 99% of your clothing items, are once again ignored! ??? This has nothing to do with the alleged tolerance of the HP universe! I find it really very unfair that people with a clothing size of 50 and above are left out by you. Your clothing is generally only designed for slim people, people of normal weight, and people with slight overweight. According to various studies, half of all women in Germany are overweight... About a quarter of all women in Germany are even severely overweight. Apart from the fact that you are thereby missing out on a huge market and a great opportunity for more sales, it is also extremely frustrating for the group you mercilessly exclude. Therefore, my request/appeal to you: please, in the future, produce clothing (Hogwarts, PB, and the four houses) for all possible clothing sizes (up to 5XL), so that both the woman weighing 50kg and the woman weighing 150kg or more can find something. That's what HP tolerance looks like. Thank you for your understanding and have a lovely Christmas!

Best regards, Mandy
Comment:
Hi Mandy,
thank you very much for your feedback, which we not only take seriously but have also immediately forwarded to our product management. Of course, we cannot promise anything, but you can be sure that your criticism will not go unheard.
Best regards from the Elbenwald!

Title: Auch für Damen?
Content: Hello, I really like the T-shirt. Can I also wear it myself? I usually wear size S. Stupid question: There is also size S. Is that then like "men's size S" or is S the same for both men and women?  Best regards, Lara:)
Comment:
Hello Lara,

of course you can also wear the shirt. However, with this shirt it would be a "men's S". Unlike most women's shirts, this one is not tailored but straight-cut. Personally, I also wear a women's S and like to wear men's S shirts. They then fit a bit looser. Otherwise, I tuck them into my pants or tie them a little at the back if I want them to fit closer. I hope I was able to help you.

Best regards from the Elbenwald.

Title: Sieht schön aus aber mehr auch nicht
Content:
The ring and the presentation box are visually very beautiful, however, there are some flaws. Firstly, the stone is made of plastic, which is not so bad. What is more of an issue is that the holder to which the ring should be securely attached is loose on me. So much so that the ring almost falls out. This means it belongs on the shelf, but you should also leave it there. Therefore, I have a few minus points. I don't know if this holder is only of poor quality in my case or if this is a general problem.

Best regards,
Helena Weasley

I paid about 27€ for the jacket during a promotion, but I am still very disappointed.

Title: Sehr schöner Ring  aber...
Content: The article I have here has its little flaws - it doesn't sparkle as beautifully as in the pictures... it looks a bit "dull"! Okay, that was to be expected and it bothers me less, but what bothers me is on the underside (back of the crystal) - I see something that looks like "patina." As if it's rusting or the paint is peeling off. And that with 925 silver, for €119 I would have expected more. I'm currently considering whether it should be returned, which I would find a shame - :( In general - hardly any information about materials etc. What is this green stone in the ring even supposed to be?!
Comment:
Hello Uwe,

Title: Frage
Content: I would like to buy the magic wand, but there are two, and I would like to know what the difference is?
Comment:
Hello Ginny,

with the other wand, you probably mean the wand of Ginny in the character edition. The wand for young wizards includes a bookmark, the character wand does not. The wand for young wizards is made of plastic and is smaller than the replica. The replica is made of a resin mixture and is also equipped with a metal rod in the middle, so that it lies better in the hand and is also more stable. The replica also comes with a gold-colored nameplate. The wand for young wizards is better suited for children, as it is not as fragile if it happens to fall on a hard surface.

I hope I was able to help you and sufficiently answered your question. :) Best wishes from the Elvenwood

Title: Super, aber...
Content:
So, I really love the glasses! 10 points for that!
Butterbie, unfortunately, is not my thing, so one point deducted. Nevertheless, you can use the glasses really well for iced tea or other drinks.
There's just one question left unanswered:
How heat-resistant are the glasses? Can you pour boiling water into them (for example, for tea or coffee)?
Comment:
Hey Mey Malfoy,
yes, that should work. It's best to start by pouring just a small sip of hot water into the glass first, so it can warm up briefly and get used to the heat. Once it has had hot water in it, don't immediately switch to cold water. The sudden temperature change could cause the glass to crack. Otherwise, it shouldn't be a problem.
Best wishes from the Elvenwood.

Best wishes from the Elven Forest. :)

Title: Zulassung zum Bekuscheln
Content:
Dear Wizarding Community,

After thorough consideration, MoM can wholeheartedly agree to the acquisition of this magical creature. It is soft and has the perfect size to engage with it.

Through movement and gentle pressure in the right place (lower abdominal area), natural different sounds (like curious sniffing or contented purring) are produced. However, these can also be suppressed, allowing for a silent handling.

"Behavioral guidance" of both arms and the head by hand is possible. The arms and head can be "guided" by both an adult and a child.

Should shiny valuables ever disappear, MoM advises cautiously reaching into the small belly pouch. Although he carries his gold coin with him, it is possible that the Niffler, after becoming accustomed to his new home, might have hidden it there.

Both older and younger wizards and witches who have lost their hearts to fantastic creatures will enjoy this creature.

>Department of the Regulation and Control of Magical Creatures
Comment:
Dear MoM,
we thank you for these warmly written words.
Best wishes from the Elvenwood. :)

It really depends on the care you take, and from what I hear, you handle your wands with great care.

Best wishes from the Elven Forest. :)

Title: Eigentlich perfekt, aber...
Content:
Unfortunately, I must have received a Monday model... or something went wrong during shipping. I had ordered it some time ago and didn't immediately notice the small crack on the front. Since it was very fine and mostly visible at the top, I was disappointed but thought I could live with it. Now, I've really used it very rarely and always washed it carefully by hand, yet the crack has now spread across the entire front, so that the cappuccino even leaked through... incredibly disappointing.

Perhaps I can still use it as decoration since the crack is really only noticeable in very good light, and I'll order a new one, because it is definitely one of the most elegant cups I own.

Always check very carefully to make sure everything arrives intact! :(
Comment: Hello J. M., that's really a shame and it shouldn't be like this. You can feel free to send us a message through our customer support and then we'll look together at what we can do. There will certainly be a solution. :-) Best wishes from Elbenwald. :)

Title: Waschbar?

Hello Lina,
if there is a care label on the owl, it should indicate whether and how it can be washed. If there isn't one, you can try washing it at 30°C with low spin. But then we can't guarantee that nothing will happen. I myself wash my stuffed animals from time to time, and so far they have all survived.
Best wishes from the Elbendwald. :)

Title: Bestimmung leider nicht erfüllt
Content:
Ever since it was certain that we were moving, I've been looking forward to this doormat. When it finally happened two weeks ago, I naturally ordered the much-desired piece immediately. The order and delivery were, as always, very reliable, fast, and absolutely superb.

And there it lay. Beautiful and radiantly blue. Until the first visitor arrived... After that, the good piece unfortunately faded very quickly. By now—after two weeks—the lettering is almost unreadable, and it looks like disgusting greenish-yellow hair is growing on the mat. What's almost worse is that it bleeds onto wet shoes, and I've unfortunately had to clean our entrance area of blue shoe marks several times (which, thankfully, went well with the tiles, but still, I didn't buy a doormat to have to add extra cleaning layers).

CONCLUSION: Weatherproof is something else, beautiful is something else by now, and unfortunately, unfortunately—I wish it weren't so—this doormat will soon go to the great beyond and make way for a perhaps not so cool but more reliable mat.
Comment: Hello Katharina, that's really unfortunate and it shouldn't be like this. If a product is defective, you can certainly write a message to our customer service and then we'll see together what we can do. There will certainly be a solution. Best regards from Elbenwald. :)

Title: Zu groß
Content: Despite the poor rating, I decided to order the costume because it's the only one available for purchase in Germany. Unfortunately, the costume arrived used, and the threads were already quite loose. For M, the costume was definitely too large, and the belt looked simply like dough (it's made of silicone). Not only was the costume too large, but it was also poorly cut. As with the previous reviews, the lower part was just sloppy. Even in S or XS, it would be loose. Therefore, I don't want to risk ordering the costume again in a smaller size. Quite a shame, since it's the only costume you can get here.

Title: Die Qual der Wahl
Content:
Dear Elbenwald Team,

Hello Bagnold the Crazy,

since the wand is supposed to be suitable for show duels, I would most likely recommend the beginner wands to you, as these are made of plastic and not, as usual, from a resin mixture. Best wishes from the Elvenwood. :)

Title: Perfekte Uhr, die aber leider nicht die Zeit anzeigt
Content:
The time reverser is optically perfect, very well made, and as a collector's item, I am completely satisfied. 
However, since I would actually have liked to use the piece as a pocket watch or "necklace watch," I am very disappointed that the watch itself runs perfectly but will never display the correct time, as the hands are always in the wrong ratio to each other... (For example, the minute hand is on the half-hour, but the hour hand is on the full hour, and this unfortunately cannot be corrected by adjusting the dial :/ ) 
Apart from that, as a collector's item, it is still highly recommended!
Comment: Hey Sheev, that's really a shame and it shouldn't be like this. If a product is defective, you can definitely write a message to our customer support and then we'll see together what we can do. There will certainly be a solution. Best regards from Elbenwald. :)
