Title: Frage
Content: I have a question, namely: In what order should one read all these Tolkien books?
Comment:
Hey Sally,
according to a forum: 1. The Silmarillion, 2. The Children of Húrin, 3. The Hobbit, 4. The Lord of the Rings. Then there are other works that the person couldn't quite categorize and they include: The Book of Lost Tales I / II, The Adventures of Tom Bombadil, Unfinished Tales. Another person, however, recommends reading The Hobbit and then The Lord of the Rings, and then the rest, to be able to categorize everything clearly.
Best wishes from the Elvenwood. :)

Content: I am very satisfied with the wall mural; it is a real eye-catcher - both during the day and in the dark when it glows so beautifully. The image itself is of very high quality. The Argonath is simply the proper name of the pillars. In German, they are called the Pillars of the Kings.
Best wishes from the Elvenwood. :)

Title: zwei kleine Fragen
Content:
Is the book still a meaningful addition to Dinah Bucholz's unofficial Harry Potter cookbook in terms of content? Or are the recipes (almost) the same? I'm not entirely sure whether I should buy it...

I also wondered whether the cooking recipes are mostly vegetarian, or what proportion of vegetarian recipes there are in the book. As a vegetarian, I'm concerned that almost all the recipes might be meat-based and not easily adaptable to a vegetarian diet.
Comment:
Hey My Name,
there are really a lot of vegetarian recipes for desserts, appetizers, drinks, etc. included. This really shouldn't be a problem. For the main courses, there are some dishes with meat, but these can mostly be substituted with alternative products. Some recipes may be similar, but the book by Dinah Bucholz is more of a cookbook, whereas this one is more for those with a sweet tooth. I hope I was able to help you a little.
Best wishes from the Elvenwood. :)

This one was perfect at first glance. I opened it and noticed it had a different color (I thought it wasn't a big deal) but it was the box of the Elder Wand and doesn't even remotely match this wand. I am already disappointed. But overall, it is a beautiful wand.

Title: Nicht tragbar
Content:
The socks are well made and look good. Suitable for display in a showcase.
So why only 1 star?
Because as a normally built man, you can't wear these socks. The band is so tight that I had to take them off after just 10 minutes because they were cutting off circulation to my feet. After washing, it was even worse.

Best regards from the Elbenwald. :)

Title: Plastiknaht
Content:
The first impression was definitely very good.
When wearing it, my partner complained why it scratches so much at the seam at the bottom.
I don't know why they had to "save" on material there and what made them think, but using plastic just for sewing seems pretty crappy to me.
One pull and the plastic seam ruins the whole shirt at the bottom!
Conclusion:
No matter how cool the clothes look, I unfortunately won't order from here again.
Comment: Hello Katharina, I'm really sorry about this and it shouldn't be happening. This is the first time we've heard of it. You're welcome to contact our customer support and maybe we can find a solution together. Then we could also check if it's an isolated case or if it extends across a range. Best regards from Elbenwald. :)

Title: Optisch top, nur leider schnell kaputt
Content: Since the wallet is really beautiful despite its flaws, it deserves at least half the stars. However, the adhesive (?) holding the silver clasp for the coin compartment came loose on one side after just a short time. As a result, the coin compartment is no longer closable. This flaw has already been mentioned several times in the comments. Furthermore, the window for the cards is not really transparent but rather cloudy – thus, it unfortunately does not really serve its purpose, as the writing on the cards (e.g., public transport passes) is not really legible. The wallet does offer a lot of space, though, and the leather is still top-notch and not flaky even after prolonged use. Due to the flaws, I can only give a limited recommendation for purchase. But visually, it's a really great piece.
Comment: Hello Carina, I'm really sorry about the wallet, and it shouldn't have happened like this. You can always contact our customer support as usual, and then we can see together if we can find a solution to the problem. Best regards from Elbenwald. :)

Title: Frage
Content:
Dear Elbenwald Team,
I would like to know if the magic wand is very fragile?
Best regards
Comment:
Hey Ginny Wilson,
magic wands are collector's items in themselves, but of course they look tempting to use in duels. If the wands collide with a hard surface or bump into something roughly, it can happen that a corner chips off or, in the worst case, the wand breaks. However, I have also heard from many people that they have dueled with them and nothing happened. It probably always depends on how carefully one handles a magic wand.
Best wishes from the Elvenwood. :)

Best regards from the Elvenwood. :)

Title: Verteidigung gegen die Dunkelheit im Osten
Content:
Greetings, esteemed Elven lords of the great forest! I, a concerned citizen from the majestic Kingdom of Gondor, come to you today with the question of when one of your graceful and elegant blades will be available for purchase once more? The darkness in the east, in Mordor, seems to grow ever more threatening, and I believe having a sword in such uncertain times would be of great advantage!

I thank you in advance for your response!
Comment:
Now then, a concerned man of Gondor,
I am allowed to announce that the camp will soon be reinforced. The noble blades are still being forged in the forges of Middle-earth, and as soon as they are ready, they will embark on their journey to the Elvenwood. I was told that it would not be long now. The new swords are expected to arrive during the transition from Julius to Augustus. Of course, if complications arise on the journey, it is possible that our troops may be delayed.
In great hope that the blades will arrive soon,
an Elvenwood elf. :)

Title: Wichtig
Content: I looked at this wand in your store in Stuttgart and I really liked it, but it looked quite different from the video and your image. Where could that come from?
Comment:
Hello Lilly Lovegood,

since unfortunately I don't know what it looked like in Stuttgart, I now have 3 possibilities:
1. There are often color differences between the colors in the picture and in reality, as lighting plays a big role. You can already see this in the shop images between the Ollivander and Blister Edition. On one image, it appears lighter than on the other.
2. The box: The older boxes have the golden print, which the newer ones no longer have.
3. Since it is a rather simple wand and should have looked quite different, I could imagine that perhaps the wands of Porpentina and Queenie were swapped?

Best regards from the Elven Forest. :)

Title: Neuer Farbton?
Content:
I received my first "Die Eine Uhr Herren" for Christmas 2017. I was very satisfied. Even though the leather wears out a bit quickly. Just before Christmas 2019, my strap on the inside had already developed a really nice patina. Then the battery died, and in my attempt to change it, I severely damaged the movement. Next time, I'll go to the watchmaker ;)

My second "Die Eine Uhr Herren" I got for Christmas 2019. This month (July 2021), the battery died again. This time I want to go to the watchmaker, and I took another look at the "corpse" of my first watch. And I noticed the following:

The color of the metal parts (dials, buckle, case) is much lighter on the new watch. More of a rose gold rather than the gold of the first one. My first watch looked more like the photos in the webshop. The new strap shows no sign of patina despite being worn a lot and is also noticeably lighter.

Was the production of the watches changed over time? I preferred the old model. Just in case I ever want to order my third "Die Eine Uhr Herren"!
Comment:
Hey Hobbit1337,
over the years, it can certainly happen that there are occasional color adjustments. Whether the older color nuance, which you like so much, will be produced again, I unfortunately don't know. It's possible that it was only a batch that had a different shade. Nevertheless, I'm very happy that you like the watch so much. :)
Best regards from the Elvenwood. :)

Title: Frage
Content:
Hello dear Elbenwald team,

I don't have a wand yet but would like to buy one soon, so I'm researching wands and would like to know from you: which wand looks good, is stable and delicate (apart from the beginner wands).

Best regards, Victoire Weasley
Comment:
Hey Victoire Weasley,
since the wands are all collector's replicas and made from a special resin mixture, they can splinter or break if they fall onto a hard surface. Some wands, like Voldemort's or Nicolas Flamel's, are more prone to this because they have extra delicate tips, which may look nice but are quite fragile.
Of course, what looks good is very subjective. Personally, I really like the wands of Sirius Black and Seraphina Picquery.
In my eyes, they are all delicate because they are slender and long. Perhaps the wands of Skender and Mad-Eye Moody would be a bit "broader" than some others.
I hope I could help you a little, best regards from the Elvenwood. :)

Title: Leider sehr enttäuschend ...!
Content:
I ordered this shoe, expecting to receive a light, well-crafted wild leather boot... But unfortunately, I was really disappointed. The quality of the shoes absolutely does not justify the purchase price; I find it poorly made, the shoe is stiff, and the cut and material do not allow for a good fit on the foot in any way. The product images definitely give a false impression of the shoe.
The positive aspect of the whole thing was the quick delivery, which can't be complained about.
In the future, I won't order shoes here anymore.
Comment: Hey Lisa N., I'm truly sorry about this, and it shouldn't be like this. You can feel free to send a message to our customer support and then we'll find a solution together. Best regards from Elbenwald. :)

Title: Größen
Content:
Hello Elbenwald team,
What size does XS correspond to and is it the same for all clothing items?

Best wishes from the Elbenwald. :)

Content:
These are actually my favorite mugs, and I really enjoy using them. Unfortunately, you can tell by the quality. The Ravenclaw and Hufflepuff mugs (my house and my wife's house) are both broken now. First, the color spots came off, then the handle broke on both of them quite similarly. The other two mugs are still okay, but they are hardly ever used.
We have 2 sets, and even with the second set, the handle of the Ravenclaw mug has now broken off. So it seems to be a recurring problem, unfortunately.
Comment: Hey Danaryo, I'll check if this is a known issue or if you unfortunately got a "Monday product." Thanks for the info. You or you all can also feel free to report the issue to our customer support. Best regards from Elbenwald. :)

Title: 100 Punkte für Elbenwald
Content:
Just received the package and of course, the sweater had to be unpacked and tried on immediately. 
The anticipation alone was huge, but when I unpacked and put on the sweater, honestly, I didn't know what to say. The only thing I could muster were a few screams and words like "omg" or "wow," I was as excited as a little kid ^^

The package arrived intact and on time, so everything is great!

But now about the product itself,
I'm 1.82 meters tall and have a "normal" figure, neither very fat nor very thin, and I took the sweater in size L because I'm very tall and the sleeves are often too short. This is not the case here, for example, it fits almost perfectly and the sleeves have a pleasant length, but the sweater should not be much shorter.
As for the fabric, which is immediately noticeable when you touch and put on the sweater. Very soft and super comfortable to wear, feels very high quality and doesn't look "cheap," meaning it doesn't fit me very tightly (which I didn't want either)
but is a bit looser, yet it looks quite elegant. The fabric does itch a bit on my arms, but that's due to my sensitive skin, it's absolutely durable and really not bad.

The details make it something special.
The embroidery on the left side makes the whole thing look a bit more "real" and you get more of the feeling that the sweater is supposed to convey. The decorative stripes also make it more "authentic." And although all of this is so subtle, it still looks great, exactly what makes it subtle but beautiful. When you see the sweater, you wouldn't necessarily recognize that it has anything to do with Harry Potter (just because it has very small and few details), but as a Potterhead, you know it immediately, and that's one of the reasons why it's so great. 
I could wear it every day and would love to sleep in it, I just feel super comfortable in this sweater^^

However, I have to say that I haven't washed it yet and can't say anything about that yet, hopefully, it stays more or less the way it is now and doesn't stretch too much.

Expensive, but since it comes from Scotland from the original manufacturer, the price is really understandable and there's nothing to complain about. 
At first, I was a bit unsure because of the high price, but it is, without a doubt, worth every cent and as a Potterhead, a clear must, I recommend it to everyone, you will not regret it, you just need something like this in your wardrobe, just for the feeling of being a real student at Hogwarts once^^(now I just need the tie and the right wand, then we can start)

Conclusion
DEFINITELY BUY THIS SWEATER^^

And a big thank you to the Elbenwald team, I haven't ordered often but am already totally thrilled. Shipping has always been top and there has never been any problem. Quality is always super (which is why the prices are also quite high, but what you get for it is 100% worth it)
I'm really amazed by this shop and will definitely order here more often.^^
Comment:
Hey Merle,
first of all, thank you for your incredibly great feedback. Due to the lamb's wool, it absorbs a lot of water when washing. The best way to dry it is lying down so that it doesn't stretch due to the weight.
Best wishes from the Elven Forest. :)

Otherwise, I was satisfied with the comfort of wearing it.

Title: Frage
Content:
Hello dear Elbenwald Team,
what is the difference between the Character Edition and this one.
Best regards
Comment:
Hey Merle,
both editions are collector's editions because they come in a nice box. The wand is the same in both editions. On the one hand, the boxes differ. The Character Edition is narrower, without a velvet lining and ribbon, but it does have a name tag. The Ollivander Edition has the box design as seen in the film and is even more beautifully finished with the velvet and ribbon.
Best wishes from the Elvenwood. :)

Title: Kratzt entgegen der vielen positiven Bewertungen
Content:
EDIT: I have now decided to keep the scarf due to my love for Harry Potter :D After wearing it several times, I can say the following: The scarf keeps you very warm, and the wool seems to be the kind that scratches less due to body heat after wearing it for a while. So for people like me with sensitive skin, it's just a matter of trying it out and testing it.

Dear Elbenwald Team,
I have been waiting a long time for the scarf to be available again and was delighted when it was available again in early 2022 :) Full of anticipation, I ordered it and looked forward to the "super soft" scarf according to the reviews and description... and unfortunately, it itches a lot. Even when you run your hand over it, it feels quite rough. I even had my friend try it on, and he immediately said, "this could be softer." Now I wonder if I should maybe wash the scarf once (by hand, of course)? For the price, I honestly expect better quality wool. The workmanship is otherwise great and the colors are beautiful. It would be a shame to have to return it now, but I can't wear it like this.

Best regards, Jasmin
Comment:
Hey Jasmin,
real wool actually always feels a bit itchy. Unfortunately, I can't tell you if it would get better after washing. If you try it, please let it dry lying down, as the fully soaked wool would cause the scarf to stretch when hanging. If you're not satisfied, you can of course return it to us free of charge as always.
Best regards from the Elven Forest. :)

Title: Schlechter Scherz?
Content: I'm really a mega fan of yours and have a lot of your products. But this time I was doubly disappointed: 1. Crookedleg looks like he's been whipped by the willow a few more times and touching the thing was a really nasty experience and 2. it might be nice to mention beforehand that you can't return products from Austria without a surcharge, then maybe you wouldn't order directly during lockdown. The order naturally also came during lockdown, so it took until the store was open again. I wanted to wait and then got sick, then the return period was exceeded. Great, now I have a Crookedleg that looks like Kreacher.
Comment:
Hello Kerstin,
if the plush toy does not look like the photos, you can of course return or send it back. The extended return period currently still applies. All items purchased from November 30th to December 24th can be returned until January 15th, 2022! Maybe your product will still fall under this.
We, or rather the terms and conditions, point out beforehand that returns coming from outside Germany must be paid for by the customer. You agree to the terms and conditions before making a purchase, otherwise it wouldn't be possible. You can find this information under point 6 - Consequences of withdrawal.
Best regards from the Elbenwald. :)

Title: Sonderfall oder die Regel?
Content:
Today, the package arrived with very fast delivery. Super! Unfortunately, upon opening it, it is immediately visible that the colors do not even remotely resemble the images shown here. In reality, the figure is very bluish and not silver/gray.

Additionally, the eye is really poorly made. Behind a glass pane is simply a blurry image of the eye. This naturally makes the overall figure much worse. After all, the eye is the first thing you notice.

Furthermore, the dragon's tail is obviously broken on my figure and was simply (poorly and with a gap) glued back together. This is simply unacceptable. I tried to compare the spot with the pictures. There, you can't see any gap.

Lastly, you can see a lot of glue. The entire right wing (from the back) is covered with glue. You can see glue in the dragon's mouth. You can see glue on the base.

All these flaws unfortunately lead to my poor rating. I really wondered if I received some used product or if the figure is just so poorly made. I absolutely do not like it, especially for 100€.
Comment:
Hello Jan,
I'm truly sorry about this, and it shouldn't be like this. You're welcome to send a message to our customer support, and then we'll find a solution together.
Best regards from the Elbenwald. :)

Title: Frage: bin mir unsicher ob ich den Ring
Content: Should I wear it or hang it on the wall? What is the ring best suited for, or what would you recommend? Because I think both will look very good.
Comment:
Hello Jerome,
so if you want to hang the ring on the wall, you can take any ring with a chain or buy a ring + additionally buy a chain. Then you could hang it on the wall, wear it around your neck, as well as wear it on your finger, since you can choose the appropriate size for each individual ring. That way, you would get the most out of it.
If the ring is hanging on the wall, it is often only seen from a distance, so the model should be almost secondary there. I hope I could help you a little.
Best regards from the Elven Forest. :)

Content:

Another issue is that the micro USB port is too deep inside for the plug and a bit wobbly. As a result, the figure initially couldn't be connected. After I opened the figure (which was very easy), I could connect it, but the plug comes loose too easily.

Title: Screenshot machen!
Content: You don't receive the voucher code by email (only the invoice) - it is displayed directly after the purchase and is then unlocked after payment. Fortunately, I had done this thanks to the reviews here on the page, because you can no longer see the code in the order history afterwards. Please come up with something, like the others, where you get nice PDFs to give away (as a second attachment next to the invoice)... especially since you also have to pay 3.90 euros for a voucher card that you want to have sent (which I find a bit expensive for a letter), because unfortunately, free shipping on orders over X euros is no longer available.
Comment:
Hey Maike,
you actually still receive an additional email with the code stored in it. If you haven't received this, you can feel free to contact our customer support. The colleagues will then send you the code again.
Best regards from the Elbenwald. :)

Title: Schön aber unzuverlässig
Content:
A very nice print and when all the LEDs work, it's just great!
Unfortunately, the one on Gandalf's staff hasn't been lighting up for a few days now. Purchased in December and now in April, it's no longer fully functional.
The Argonath wall art has been used for the same length of time and as often, and although it is also unevenly illuminated, I remember it being like that from the beginning, so I think it's intentional.

Edit:
After a super friendly contact with the Elbenwald team (Thanks Thomas!), I sent a video of the defective wall art to Elbenwald via WhatsApp. It got stuck with the chatbot the first time, but later it worked, and the next day I received the message that a free replacement was sent to me, which arrived within 3 days and works perfectly. Now Gandalf can fight the Balrog again :D
Thank you very much!
Comment:
Hello Thea,
I'm truly sorry that this happened, and it shouldn't be like this. You're welcome to write to our customer support, and then we'll find a solution together.
Best regards from the Elven Forest. :)

Title: Ist der Zauberstab für Schauduelle geeignet?
Content:
I would like to buy the wand, but I want to know beforehand if the wand is suitable for "playing". Please respond quickly!

Best regards, POTTER 2.0
Comment:
Hey Micha,
the wands are made from a special resin mixture. If the wand falls on tiles or hits a hard object, it is possible that the wand will splinter or break. In itself, it is more of a collector's item, although many people also use it for cosplay and duels. You should definitely be careful.

Best wishes from the Elvenwood. :)

Title: Überraschung
Content:
The box itself is a great surprise since you don't know what items are inside.
However, what's a shame is that the surprise set is delivered without a separate outer box for the sake of the environment.
So if you order several different boxes, everything is packed together in the regular shipping carton.
Comment:
Hello Susi, we are currently working on shipping the surprise sets in a separate outer box.
Best regards from the Elbenwald

Title: Leider Angst bestätigt
Content:
I had been thinking about ordering this jacket for a long time. It had "only" one review, and the person might just have been unlucky. Nevertheless, I didn't dare to take the plunge.

My girlfriend, however, saw it differently and simply gifted it to me.

At first, I was very satisfied, but the content of the previous review quickly proved to be accurate. After washing, numerous cracks formed in the print. The jacket itself is very nice and feels good, and I quite enjoy wearing it, but it doesn't look nice anymore.

I will soon contact customer service regarding this matter and will keep further updates here.
In this regard, I am optimistic, as my experiences with customer service have been consistently positive so far.
Comment:
Hello Bastian,
we are truly sorry that this is the case, of course it shouldn't be like this. Please feel free to contact our customer support, together we will surely find a solution. Best wishes from the Elbenwald!

Title: Sehr schöne Figur, schön detailliert gemacht
Content:
The figure is very detailed and is indeed worth the price. The material is very robust and can, I think, withstand a lot compared to other figures.

However, the reason I am giving only 3 stars is the delivery. The figure arrived in a much too large box that was completely demolished. Inside the box was a lot of filler material, which was absolutely unnecessary if a smaller box had been used. Fortunately, the figure was not damaged, except for a small dent in the packaging, but please do not send it like this in the future, especially considering I paid 3.95 for shipping.

Title: Leider sehr schnell kaputt
Content: I bought the key chain because it looked very high quality. Unfortunately, the smaller chains that hold the charms are very poor quality. Even though I only hung it on the zipper of my backpack (and thus it was protected inside the backpack itself), the ring and the charm already fell off after two weeks. After a month, the clip also broke. How this could happen in the backpack, I have no idea. However, for the price, the lifespan is too short for me.

Title: Das Buch ist top, der Zauberstab ok, die Verpackung schlecht
Content:
The book contains everything one could wish for. The pages are quite thick, and the flipping is very pleasant. The pages are high-gloss, which gives the book a very elegant impression. I am really thrilled by that.

In contrast to other wands, the included Elder Wand is quite small (about 30 cm). I don't know if the real replica is also that small, but due to its size, it looks very much like a child's toy.

The book and the wand were delivered in a box with a removable plastic lid. Unfortunately, this lid (for me) is very scratched and dented, so the plastic is already white. The elegant presentation of the book is completely ruined because of this. Therefore, one star is deducted from the overall rating.
Comment:
Hello Kerstin, we are sorry that this is the case, of course it should not be like this. Feel free to contact our customer support, together we will surely find a solution.
Best regards from the Elbenwald.

Content:

Title: Schön aber: Achtung magnetisch!
Content:
I was very pleased when my notebook arrived today. In itself, the notebook is great. It is very well made, looks nice, and you can open it up so that you can write in it comfortably.

However, nowhere in the description did it say that it is a magnetic notebook. The motifs are, of course, also magnets.

I had assumed that these were stickers or something similar.

I can only make limited use of a magnetic notebook. Magnets in the pocket are unfortunately also suitable for erasing data on electronic devices… I can't just leave out the magnets, because the book itself is magnetic. Therefore, I can only use it at home or have to somehow transport it separately.

This is quite annoying, as I had imagined it differently. I will keep it anyway, as I like it for the reasons described at the beginning.
Comment: Hi Link! Thanks for your tip, the description will be expanded. But you don't have to worry about your electronic devices, the magnets aren't strong enough for that. Best wishes from the Elvenwood!

Title: Schön, aber...
Content:
I was really looking forward to these swords. The description stated that the materials are plastic and metal. Unfortunately, it didn't specify further. Today the swords arrived, and the disappointment was great... unfortunately, the blades, handles, and even the chain are made of plastic. For the price, I actually expected metal blades and chains.

However, I want to emphasize that the swords are really very beautiful to look at and also have a great size!

This is just my opinion.
For cosplay, they are perfect, especially since you usually can't bring metal swords to conventions.
Unfortunately, I will have to return the swords, as they don't fit into my collection of metal swords (not sharp).
Comment: Thank you very much for your feedback, I understand your criticism. The metal is only the housing for the batteries. I will adjust the material description so that there will be no more confusion in the future. Best wishes from the Elven Forest!

Title: Leider denkt man durch die Fotos von
Content: Unfortunately, the photos of the wand make you think that the handle is made of metal (similar to Dumbledore's first wand). But unfortunately, the handle is dull and only painted with a reflective color. Not what I expected, because I was really looking forward to it looking just like the picture. I also find the handle much too light and the weight is more concentrated at the tip. As a result, it doesn't hold as well in the hand. Okay for the collection, but not a wand I would proudly display on my shelf. It looks a bit "cheaply" made. Too bad.
Comment: It's a shame the wand didn't meet your expectations. The return is free of charge in case you wish to return it.

Title: Der Helm besteht komplett aus Plastik. Die
Content: The helmet is completely made of plastic. The workmanship at the back of one part of the clasp is really poorly done. The sound when turning it on sounds scratchy, and one of the pins is stuck, causing a loose connection. The pins are responsible for making the eyes light up and the sound play. In most cases, the eyes don't light up and you have to pull the pin out a bit with tweezers. For 200 €, absolutely not recommended.
Comment:
Hello Tobias, we are sorry that this is the case, of course it should not be like this. Feel free to contact our customer support, together we will surely find a solution. 
Best regards from the Elbenwald.

Title: Leider hat hier die Qualität der Verarbeitung
Content:
Unfortunately, the quality of the workmanship here was lacking. The wand is about 1 cm too short (not a big deal in principle, if the rest were right), the diameter is noticeably and visibly too small. The painting does not look like the picture (paler/different shades) and also the details such as the indentations just after the handle are barely present or the end of the handle is flat and not rounded.

Upon inquiry, it seems to be a different batch... Unfortunately, this is visibly different from the promotional images and accordingly disappointing.
Especially since a friend has the "right" one, this batch unfortunately looks really like a cheap version in comparison. And for the same money...

Perhaps in the future there will be another decent batch.
Comment: We are very sorry, this should not happen at all! Please feel free to place a new order. Best regards from Elbenwald.

Title: Traumhaft schöne neue Geschichten aus der Disney-Tierwelt für alle Disney-Liebhaber in wundervoller Aufmachung
Content: Another book from the great golden Disney books, and this one too in the already familiar high-quality and noble hardcover edition. Unfortunately, this book came without a bookmark, hence the 1-star deduction. Otherwise, it is a pure delight both as a collectible for Disney fans and especially for reading and reading aloud for big and small Disney lovers. Many beautiful stories of well-known Disney animals are also complemented here with equally beautiful illustrations, providing the entire family with joyful hours. Thus, "The Great Golden Book of Animal Stories" is a great addition to "The Great Golden Book of Disney Stories" and "The Great Golden Book of Princesses."
Comment: Wow, thank you so much for your detailed feedback! We are very happy to hear that you like the books so much. 🤗 Best wishes from the Elvenwood!

Title: Kauft das Mousepad, es lohnt sich so sehr!
Content:
I am absolutely thrilled. I have never loved my mousepad so much, and the fact that it is large enough to accommodate the keyboard makes it even better. The quality is very good, I have nothing to complain about, so the price-performance ratio is definitely top-notch. The design is also very well executed. So I can definitely recommend this mousepad to any dedicated fan of the Harry Potter world!

And apart from the product, the customer service is also excellent. The way the emails are written, both for order confirmation, invoice, and delivery, is simply great. I have never read an email all the way through before, but from Elbenwald, I did so with pleasure. Absolutely fantastic experience, and I will order again anytime, as long as my finances allow. Really, I am very impressed!
Comment: Woooooooooow 🤩 Thank you so much for your detailed feedback! We are very happy that you like the mousepad so much (by the way, it's also under my laptop 😉). We are also glad if we were able to bring a smile to your face with our emails. 😊 Best wishes from the Elbenwald

Title: Tolles Sammlerstück, Boxdeckel leider ohne Halt
Content:
To the Ring:
Beautiful craftsmanship. The details on the ring itself, as well as the Resurrection Stone, are very well made. Unfortunately, it is one or two millimeters too large for me to wear, but that's due to the standard size😅
Regarding the Box:
The only drawback is that the lid of the box, where the ring is supposed to be placed, is unfortunately only loosely placed on top. I would have preferred some kind of closure or something similar.
(Perhaps a hinge on one side of the triangle, so that you could lift it up and then slide it sideways onto the box, so that at least there would be a holding point at the bottom or a simple click mechanism)
The small pedestal with the ring holder does prevent the lid from sliding back and forth too much, but unfortunately it's still a bit wobbly.
Just like with the Slytherin locket, the inside walls of the box are lined with mirrors. This makes the box appear a bit larger and also looks nice.
Conclusion:
Good quality; minor things that could be improved, but overall a great collectible and looks very nice on the shelf.
Comment: Wow, thank you so much for your detailed feedback! We're really happy to hear that the Horcrux Ring fits so beautifully into your collection 🤗

Title: Toller Pullover. Er ist äußerst weich und
Content:
Great sweater. It is extremely soft and well-made. I also didn't notice the typical scratchiness of new wool. The only drawback is a slight pilling at the beginning, but that doesn't justify losing a star. However, be careful with the size, as it runs relatively small. I wear a 43/44 shirt size and took XL. It fit, but there's not much room left, so if you prefer it more relaxed, you should choose a size larger. 
I'd buy it again anytime.

Black spots, paint flaws, blemishes, not a single bowl has arrived without defects. However, I expect that at this price! Connecting the bowls with advertising for the noodles, I unfortunately lack any imagination when it comes to the size of the bowl. Realistically speaking, also much too heavy and unwieldy. Well, once and never again.
Comment: I am very sorry that the shell does not meet your expectations. Please contact our customer support at info@elbenwald.de. The colleagues there will be happy to assist you!

Title:
Das Holz ist gut verarbeitet.
Leider ist der
Content:
The wood is well-processed.
Unfortunately, the printing is noticeably weaker at the edges than in the center, as if the ink is running out.
I use it as an Ouija board and find the arrangement of the symbols very well done.
The planchette is made of very thin and color-inconsistent wood. However, this does not affect the usability in the slightest.
I would prefer this board over many other available ones.
A great product at a very good price.

Die Lampe ist der Hammer!

The lamp is the hammer!

Title: Schade

Title: Ein echt super Puzzle. Den vorherigen Bewertungen
Content: A truly great puzzle. I completely disagree with the previous reviews. I often do puzzles in my free time and use various manufacturers. This puzzle, however, has completely convinced me. The pieces are varied with different shapes and corners, and you can clearly see where a piece fits and where it doesn't. I cannot confirm that the puzzle is split in the middle or shifted in the middle. The image on the puzzle pieces is not blurry, and logically, a 3000-piece puzzle is larger than the packaging, so you have to use your brain a bit. That the puzzle takes a bit longer is just as logical, and anyone who has done puzzles before knows that. If you have no puzzle experience, or if you get quickly frustrated and don't have the endurance for it, you should simply not get a 3000-piece puzzle.
Comment:
Wow, thank you so much for your detailed review! We are very happy to hear that you love Puzzle so much. 🤗
Warm regards from Elbenwald and lots of fun with puzzling.

Title: 10/10 Für den Preis eine besser Designte Figur zu finden wird extrem Schwer sein.
Content:
What more can I say about it? It was simply a really good decision for me to buy the Minato figure. My parents are generally against anime figures and such, but this was truly the first time that even my parents thought the figure was just awesome. Design-wise, it's simply top-notch. You won't often find the figure in the store itself. I ordered the figure from the store, and it arrived at the store just three days later. Of course, I picked it up and immediately unboxed it, sending a photo of it to my friends on WhatsApp. My friends' reviews were very positive.

Definitely recommend it to everyone, not just for Naruto fans.
Comment: Wooooooow, thank you so much for your detailed feedback! We are very happy to hear that the figure was well-received by everyone and that you are satisfied. ❤️ Best wishes from the Elven Forest 🤗

Title: 1. A T-Shirt
Content:
Once upon a time, there was a girl who lived in a little house at the edge of the Heinzelmännchen Forest. 

The girl had a sweet little dog named Loki, and she loved him very much. 

One evening, while scrolling through the internet, she saw this LOKI T-shirt and was immediately enchanted. 

She simply had to have it. 
Sure, it cost a few gold coins, but it would be worth it. 

She pressed the magic button "Buy Now," and the order set off on its journey through the magical World Wide Web. 

Shortly after, she received an order confirmation, which was perfect because she wasn't exactly the most patient person. 

Two days later, it seemed as if the delivery had been made by "Flash," as the man in the "yellow suit" rang her doorbell.

Her heart raced as if "Thor" had struck it with his hammer.

She took the package, thanked him, and ran into the house to open and wear it as quickly as possible.

As she held the T-shirt in her hands, she felt its great quality and the vibrant print on deep black fabric. The size was also perfect and fit her perfectly. 
She immediately put on the shirt, grabbed her dog "Loki," and they went together into the sunset of the Heinzelmännchen Forest. 

Happy to have made this decision.
Comment: How lovely to hear that you like the shirt so much! Thank you very much for your feedback ❤️

Title: Alles in allem ein schöner, kuscheliger Bademantel, d. h. Kaufempfehlung meinerseits.
Content:
I had the robe with me at a wellness day in the sauna and am satisfied.

The quality and workmanship of the robe is okay, although I think the belt could be better made. It seems the seams are not quite right. However, this is not noticeable when wearing it.

The robe looks a bit different in the picture than in reality. The fabric "shines" a bit, which makes it not as black as in the picture, but rather looks anthracite. The fabric is, as expected, not very breathable, since it is not cotton but polyester. But I was already aware of this when I bought it. If the hood is not worn, it does not fall so nicely. It folds up, which I don't like.

All in all, a nice, cozy bathrobe, i.e. a purchase recommendation from me.

The design is unbeatable, and the quality of the printing and the material itself are great. 10/10

After about three years, it was slowly time for a replacement, and to my shock, I had to realize that the same shower curtain was no longer available. Sadly, I had to resort to a shower curtain from another brand, and ever since, I've been annoyed with it every day because it didn't have such a cool design, nor was it as waterproof and pleasant to touch as my beloved HdR shower curtain. Title: Schöne Räume, potenziell teurer Sammelspaß
Content:
I bought the Mystery Pack for my girlfriend, who was thrilled. The space is small enough that you can actually find a place for it anywhere, but large enough to allow for a certain level of detail richness. The rooms give the impression that you are accidentally observing a Pokémon as it, for example, makes books float.
At €22.95, the price is quite high, especially when you consider that you need to buy at least four (more likely more) of them to complete a set. However, the price is justified by the Pokémon license.

Content: The Spin Master magic wands are more than just "toys"; they don't need to hide from the big "replicas"! Robust AND with nice detail, not too short, no noticeable seams or anything like that... It works! A good selection is already available (with & without magic spell card), but I would recommend the ones WITH cards. The cards are also sturdy and simply have even more of that cute, exclusive Wizarding MANGA (!) design. In clean, clear print & with a slightly familiar, LIGHTLY "used" look. Worth it.

Title: Mein SCHATZ
Content:
I love it!

I had wanted it for so long and finally bought it (I wear it all the time). The ring is very beautiful, the engraving is well done, and you can see the lettering clearly. Unfortunately, I can't wear it on my ring finger because I have size 52, but it fits on my middle finger (size 54). I prefer to wear it as a necklace.

I would recommend to everyone to order this ring from Elbenwald, and the price is definitely justified!

A great product.

Title: Tu es.
Content:
I love Lord of the Rings and I equally love to immerse myself in art. Whether it's a good book, a manga, No Man's Sky, or occasionally a movie or a series: it's best done in a room blessed with nerd stuff. Reptiles, statues, scrolls and... hmmm... an old, boring blanket? NOPE! Never again! Elbenwald has the holiest and most cuddly blanket I've ever seen and felt. NOW I am truly immersed in art. My brother was so jealous that I've already pre-ordered one for him for Christmas (in May). Not that the blanket would suddenly disappear.

By the way, absolute bonus: My cat loves the blanket above all else. He sleeps on it when I'm working, and as soon as I cover myself with it, he spawns on my lap and makes his nest.

Thanks, Elbenwald, also for your awesome emails! Gladly again :)

Title: Toller, langer und warmer Schal mit einem
Content:
Great, long and warm scarf with a Ravenclaw patch at one end.
I have sensitive skin and initially, unfortunately, it scratched a bit. But after one wash in the washing machine (wool program, 30 degrees and additional fabric softener), the problem was solved. The washing also did not affect the colors or the fuzz at the end.
I think I will have a lot of joy with this scarf for a very long time. :)

Title: Tolles Kleid 👌
Content: I was initially unsure about the size and then instinctively made the right decision. At 1.70m and 64 kg, size XS fits me perfectly. Without a belt, it still has a certain "width." With a belt, it accentuates the figure and looks very good. The fabric is very nice. A beautiful sturdy cotton fabric, but not too tight/thick. The neckline is also nice, as it can be worn tighter or looser. The color is also great. A rich brown, just like in the pictures. I'm looking forward to wearing it 😊

Title: Ein solides GUT
Content: The fabric is solid, the stitching is very good, however, the cut is extremely simple. What I mean by that is, I pull a sack over myself, and it hangs just like this shirt. And the size is a bit of an issue. Normally, at 1.83 meters tall, I wear XL clothes. I once bought an XL shirt and it was quite tight. This time, I got a XXL shirt and it's very loose. So there doesn't seem to be a middle ground, which is something I don't particularly like. In the end, I'm still satisfied with the price-performance ratio. Don't expect a mega product, but it's a good thing to wear at a medieval market.
Comment: Thank you very much for your feedback 😊

Title: Läuft beim Waschen ein
Content: The dress is absolutely beautiful, but: According to the manufacturer, it can be washed at 30 degrees. I did this, and it has shrunk by at least 2 dress sizes—very unfortunate!! However, since it absorbed the stubborn barbecue smell of a medieval market, it should definitely be washable—but then only cold by hand or to the dry cleaners. One more tip: Since it is slightly see-through, it's better to wear a flesh-colored slip underneath.

Title: Gute Stiefel aber fallen mindestens eine Nummer größer aus
Content:
I bought the boots at a market over the weekend and so far I'm satisfied. I also put in an insole, which makes them even more comfortable. I would recommend using an insole to anyone who doesn't have a "standard foot," as the boots are more designed for normal foot shapes. The leather is initially quite stiff but softens up quickly. I padded the back with some softer leather from the inside because it does rub a bit uncomfortably.
ATTENTION! The boots run at least one size larger!

Title: Sehr schöne schlichte Kette
Content:
I've had the necklace for 2 weeks now and I love it.
It's super simple and doesn't immediately scream 'Harry Potter,' which was very important to me.
Both the pendant and the chain are stamped with 925 silver (I'm writing this because some people said the chain wasn't silver).
Whether it will eventually tarnish, I obviously don't know yet, but I don't think so, because silver doesn't tarnish, it just oxidizes, which should be reversible with silver polish.
I can only say that it's very well made, I wear it every day, and (for me) it was worth every cent.
The only negative thing I could say is that the packaging is a bit 'cheap' for the price, but since you actually wear the necklace, it doesn't bother me that much personally, I was just a bit surprised and slightly worried at first that I might have been sent the cheaper necklace, which wasn't the case.
Comment: Thank you very much for your feedback 😊

Title: It's dangerous to go alone, take your Hyrule blankie with you
Content:
Recently on my couch – the sun had already disappeared behind the mountains at the foot of which I live, and cooler hours were setting in. Quite unexpectedly, it had been quite warm that day, which is why I was only wearing a shirt of my beloved football club and a loose pair of shorts with a Star Wars print. As I lounged there, playing The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild, something fresh began to brush against my bare legs as it grew darker. Since my partner had my football-themed blanket in use and the other option was an incredibly warm blanket, I thought to myself, "I need to do something about this." So I ordered this Legend of Zelda blanket, and when it finally landed on my doorstep, I was overjoyed. It's super cozy, and I'm a bit sad that it's currently so warm that I don't need a blanket at all, but I'm already looking forward to cooler days again.
The coins I exchanged for this good and beautiful piece are absolutely worth it!
Dear Elbenwald team, I hope this review has brought you at least half as much joy as my new blanket (and your entertaining emails) have brought me! : ))
Comment: Wow, thank you so much for your feedback!❤️ Best wishes from the Elvenwood!

I've already bought several T-shirts from Elbenwald. Yes, eventually every design starts to wear out a bit.

But this one is alarming. Soon I won't be able to wear it anymore, and I've only worn it twice. And the design is peeling off in many small places. It doesn't look good anymore, unfortunately.

The material is nice, the color too. But I wouldn't buy it again. And I can't even recommend it.

Title: Das Produkt war super, alles gut verpackt
Content:
The product was great, everything well packaged and the shipment arrived in 2 days, so from that side everything was excellent. 
These are pre-made special decks for a specific play format, so you should of course inform yourself beforehand about what the decks can do, etc. Nice are the 2 additional bonus cards included, which are often nicer versions of rare cards, including a card that can only be played in the Commander format. 

What really sticks out negatively, however, is the pricing policy at Elbenwald, regarding all Commander decks. 
While you pay €38,- depending on the deck at the partner store, you generally pay €50,- here. Sure, rent and wages are included, but the small store also pays those, so I don't understand how they justify this. 

Nevertheless: nice deck, good service so far, one point deducted as mentioned due to the price in general.
Comment: Thank you very much for your feedback. Best regards from the Elbenwald.

Content:
The tunic is made of rough material but is still very soft and pleasant on the skin, and is beautifully simple. The color is as shown in the picture, blue/gray. I wouldn't recommend it for the hottest days of the year, but certainly for normal summer days and with a lining tunic, also in the fall.
As always, everything went smoothly and the communication/emails are unbeatable... S U P E R! :)
I have been a customer of Elbenwald for a long time and will certainly remain one, as I have never been disappointed! Thanks to the entire team!

Title: Schön
Content: I ordered a Leonardo Carbone dress a while ago, and it turned out to be huge. That's why I tried M and L here. I can wear everything from M to XL, and here M actually fit. My mom could have worn the L, but she didn't want to. So in doubt, go for the smaller size. But I have to say, the larger the size, the longer the dress, so I would have had to have the L hemmed. The M fits in length so that I don't step on it yet. I'm 1.70 meters tall. Great dress, I washed it in the hand wash cycle, and luckily it still fits.
Comment: Thank you so much for your detailed feedback! ❤️ Best wishes from the Elven Forest.

Title: Sehr gute Verarbeitung, super Schnitt, auf die Größe Achten
Content:
The shoes are dreamy and simply perfect for any Viking costume. Soft leather, good sole, which is really important when you're at a festival with lots of pebbles.
The cut is from a find from a Viking grave. That's why it's the right shoe for a Viking costume.
The only drawback is that the shoes are much, much too small. Very narrow cut.
I ordered size 40, but I would have needed at least size 42. Anyone who takes that into account will get a really great shoe.

Title: Einfach alles BESTENS!
Content:
The overall shopping experience at Elbenwald was excellent: despite an enormous range of products, you quickly and easily find your way around the Elbenwald webshop. The prices are almost suspiciously low, but the quality of the goods then actually dispels any doubts: very well made, the sizes are sensible and easy to compare, and the visual condition matches the example image in the shop exactly—no color tricks, no light-shadow gimmicks—in short: what you see is what you get.
The delivery is quick and in a secure, good packaging.
Moreover, despite the excellent price level, you receive a free return option. This minimizes the risk of shopping in the Elbenwald webshop to zero.
Bravo!! Here, I would like to award 10 stars as well.
Comment: Wow, thank you so much for your feedback! We are very happy to hear that. 😊 Best wishes from the Elbenwald!

Title: Wow - echt toll und riesig
Content:
Well, I've already tried several times to leave a review here. But somehow it didn't work out—unlike my other, very positive reviews. Once, the title was even too short (???).

So, here we go again:
The Krätze figure is really big, but beautifully made. So the price/performance ratio is top-notch.
The recipient, a big HP fan, and I laughed heartily at the "giant beast." Of course, it stays Krätze.
However, a slightly smaller model, suitable for the size of Krummbeak and Hedwig, would have been nicer.
But: Whoever can read is clearly at an advantage ;)

The HP items are really great and inspiring. The purchasing process was problem-free. Keep it up!
Comment: How lovely to hear. Thank you so much for your wonderful feedback ❤️

Title: Sehr edel!
Content:
As soon as I unpacked it, I was very excited and surprised. The wall art looks very elegant and high-quality. I already had the smaller version of the product, but this one definitely tops the smaller one and is absolutely worth the purchase and the higher price. If possible, you should opt for the large version. The fact alone that the map is framed and not glued makes the difference! You don't have to be a big fan of the Hobbit movies (I'm not either) because this image also fits with items from "The Lord of the Rings" and the Middle-earth theme in general. Absolute purchase recommendation for elegant Middle-earth wall decor!
Tip: The wall art looks great next to the key holder with Bilbo's map of Bag End on it. (if still available).
Comment: Wooooooow, thank you so much for your detailed feedback! We are very happy to hear that you like the mural so much. ❤️ Best wishes from the Elvenwood

Title: Schöner Becher, leider nicht ganz dicht.
Content:
Nice mug, high-quality production. The stainless steel mug keeps drinks moderately warm for a while.
However, the drinking spout in the lid does not seal tightly, so when transporting it, smaller amounts of liquid can easily leak out if the mug is not perfectly upright or if the drink sloshes a bit. The rim on the lid is high enough that it doesn't drip down the mug, but it's still annoying. The lid closure itself is, however, tight.
Comment: Thank you very much for your feedback. We will take care of the matter and have the cup checked. Best regards from Elbenwald.

Title: Zauberhaft und traumhaft
Content:
This seal is the bomb, even though it's quite expensive. But the execution and quality are then again quite mild. The seal is in a sturdy, heavy design and really makes an impression. The depiction of Hogwarts as a griffin is really great. It's also very nicely packaged, so you can give it away perfectly as a gift.
One thing is however strange. Why is the sealing wax purple and gold and not red like in the movie?
Nevertheless, it's really great and a highlight for HP fans.
We will use it to seal the wedding invitations for our children.
However, we will get red wax and use it... and practice diligently beforehand. ;)
Comment: We are very happy to hear that! ❤️ A great idea. Magical greetings from the Elvenwood.

Title: Die Idee ist cool, dass Material nicht!
Content:
So, the idea is great, but the material leaves something to be desired. I thought the coasters were made of plastic (I didn't read much about it, so maybe it was mentioned) and therefore easy to clean, but that's not the case. They are made of cardboard, and printed paper was glued on the front and back. Now, of course, glasses/bottles can sometimes get a bit damp.

I kept them anyway because I like the idea. But they won't last long.

It's a fun accessory for a party. Definitely not suitable for long-term use. ;)
Comment:
Thank you for your feedback. We will take a closer look at the article and may consult with the manufacturer if necessary.
Please contact our customer support at info@elbenwald.de. The colleagues there will be happy to assist you. ❤️

Title: Mehr als nur Dopplungen
Content:
I ordered 2x9 T-shirts. 
Of course, the price is absolutely unbeatable. In the case of possible duplicates, I assumed duplicates and not 3x the same T-shirt each. I ordered 18 T-shirts and now received the same T-shirt 6 times. That means 2/3 of the ordered shirts consist of 2 designs. One of the two designs is no longer available in the store, so it must have been discontinued. Additionally, I received two more T-shirts twice and only 2 T-shirts once.
The quality of the T-shirts is TOP. But with 18 shirts only 6 different designs and 2/3 of the order only two designs is really disappointing. I wish for more from Elbenwald and that the word "duplicates" in the description is changed or adhered to.
Comment:
The selection of surprise shirts is constantly changing, and with larger orders, duplicates may occur. 
Best regards from Elbenwald.

Title: Absoluter hin Gucker aber..
Content:
This combo is very cool and has a very aesthetic look. When everything is in place and all the laces are tightened, the magic doesn't feel far away. However, there is a small point deduction. The cloak is supposed to be held together by a ring. Since the fabric is very thick and heavy, the ring cannot hold the weight and bends. I have looked for another solution, but it would be nicer if the ring were made of sturdier material.

Best regards to the Elbenwald team!

Title: Nicht empfehlenswert
Content:
The alarm clock is made very cheaply. The biggest drawback is that it doesn't have a battery or a rechargeable battery. It always has to be plugged into an outlet.
The fact that the time can only be set as AM/PM (there is no 24-hour display) is not great but maybe still acceptable. CONCLUSION: An alarm clock under 10 euros has more functions than this one. I wouldn't buy it again.
Comment: We are very sorry that this should not have happened. Please contact our customer support at info@elbenwald.de. The colleagues there will be happy to assist you. ❤️

Title: Glaskuppel passt Nicht!
Content: The package and its contents arrived at my place undamaged. Only a pity that the glass dome was quite scratched on one hand and on the other hand, the dome is so cheaply produced that it doesn't fit the holder of the vial at all. The rim around the glass dome isn't even symmetrical, which is really a no-go for 50 euros. The vial and the holder look quite good at first glance, but unfortunately, they will now get dusty just by looking at them. For the price, I expected more.

Title: Ich bin mehr als zufrieden
Content:
I am a really big Naruto Shippuden fan and have been looking for a place where I can find beautiful figures for a long time and stumbled upon Elbenwald. 
I have now placed my first order here and am really more than just satisfied, everything worked perfectly and I find the service perfect and especially the emails very amusing, which only makes you more likable.

Now, about the figure I chose.
I fell in love with it and it makes my heart beat faster, and for the price, it's an unbeatable figure, just in terms of detail, and I can already say that it won't be my last order.
If I could, I would probably buy half the store...

The only thing that can be said, which is not influenced by Elbenwald, is that the stand of the figure doesn't really hold.
But that's nothing that a few seconds of super glue couldn't fix :)

Title: Design nicht durchdacht
Content:
A nice cup in itself, but the design is not well thought out. The motif is located as a paper sleeve "in" the cup, i.e., between the actual cup and a transparent plastic sleeve, which creates the nice 3D effect. However, this is not watertight, and immediately after the first careful (!) hand washing, the water somehow got in between and ran down the entire length of the cup inside, causing the beautiful paper motif to become totally unsightly and soggy, and from now on it bulges unevenly against the plastic sleeve (whether it will dry properly again and not possibly mold remains to be seen).
I understand that the cup is not dishwasher safe, but that it cannot withstand even careful hand washing seems questionable to me - it is supposed to be used and therefore regularly cleaned...
I am already a bit disappointed, because the cup was not cheap, and so I will only use it for my home coffee if at all... Too bad! 🥺

Title: Ein MUSS für jeden Potterhead
Content:
The quality of the cloak is really very good and especially very high-end. 
I initially ordered the M size, but unfortunately, I had trouble buttoning it up because my bust prevented me from doing so. 
So I then ordered the L size, and now I have a lot of fabric :D Ideally, I would have liked an in-between size, but ultimately, the cloak is usually worn more at a convention, so it's fine for me. 

I'm 1.70m tall, weigh 77kg, and the cloak reaches down to my ankles and definitely doesn't drag on the ground (which was personally important to me).

Conclusion: The colors, the quality, and the overall look are perfect with this cloak, and it's really worth every cent. :3

Title: Schön aber etwas klein
Content:
The bag looks very nice and is also well made. Unfortunately, it is very unstable. As shown in one of the pictures, almost freestanding, you can't stand it up. It doesn't have a "solid" wall or built-in stabilization, which I find very unfortunate, as it hangs like a collapsed something when you carry it (empty). A large iPad fits very well in the bag, but as soon as you want to put a water bottle or something else in it, it becomes difficult and the zipper won't close anymore.

So, I would only recommend the bag if you have to carry very, very, very little. Otherwise, it simply doesn't fit.
Comment: It's a shame the bag is too small for your intended use. Perhaps you'll find a larger one with us. Magical size from the Elvenwood.

Title: Bewertung
Content:
The wallet is robust and has very good quality. The craftsmanship is high-quality and the product is still undamaged despite long use. I particularly like that it is small and slim. And for me, it has exactly the right amount of card slots. However, I find storing the bills a bit difficult, as you either have to put them in the coin compartment or in one of the slots where larger bills won't fit.
Overall, I am very satisfied with the wallet.

Title: Gutes Preis-Leistungsverhältnis
Content: These are more like cosplay swords, as they are very fragile. A test showed that they can only withstand pressure when struck against the blade. The quillons are useless for parrying. The grip is designed like that of a two-handed sword, but the overall length is like that of my LARP Viking sword. I got the swords at a very good price and can't expect anything better for the price. My own LARP Viking sword cost twice as much as these two swords combined. I bought the swords for my husband so we could practice together, and he was very pleased (after initially being very skeptical). The first joint practice session with one of these swords was very entertaining. I can also easily imagine these swords being suitable for my 11- or 12-year-old nephews.
Comment: Thank you for your feedback. These swords are more suitable for cosplay than for intensive use. Despite their fragility, they are good for practice and fun, especially at this affordable price. We appreciate your review and your understanding of the value for money. Thanks! 😊

Title: Ein wenig enttäuschend
Content:
I happily anticipated my box, but unfortunately received something from a different house (Slytherin, but I'm Hufflepuff). I would appreciate it if the products were completely neutral (i.e., Hogwarts themed) or if you could choose your house.

If you don't expect anything specific (a specific house), this box is cool, but I'm a bit disappointed.
Comment:
Thank you very much for your feedback and your honest opinion. We are sorry to hear that you were disappointed. We understand your desire for neutral Hogwarts-themed products or the option to choose your house.

It is important to emphasize that the contents of the box change regularly, and it can be challenging to always meet the personal taste of every customer. Your feedback is valuable and will help improve the product selection in the future. We appreciate your opinion and hope that we can better meet your expectations in the future. Your Elbenwald Team

Title: 👍🏻👏🏻 toller und seriöser Shop, hat mein Glaube an das gute Internet wieder versöhnt.
Content:
Dear Elbenwaldians,

I was traversing the Pyrenees with a group of companions when my electronic scout reported that the bundle containing your treasures had arrived at my campsite back home. Since then, I have eagerly anticipated every mile of my journey back, eager to hold the valuables in my hands. And today, it has finally come to pass. The treasure chest stands intact before me, and the excitement is great. Now, I carefully and eagerly open the chest. What joy to see and hold the beautiful relics. This is exactly how I had hoped the treasures would be, and I am delighted to finally be able to call them my own. A long search has come to a successful end, and missing pieces have been successfully added to my collection. Many thanks to your brave treasure hunters, who made it possible to track down and deliver these rare gems to me. You are the greatest heroes! Greetings to you all, and for the next treasure hunt, I would be more than happy to join your guild again briefly.

Until then, your Jutta Kunze
Comment: What a wonderful and creative report! We are very pleased that you are so satisfied with your purchase from Elbenwald. Your description brings to mind a real adventure and gives our collaboration a magical charm. Thank you for your enthusiasm and for the humorous presentation. We are ready for the next treasure hunt and send you our warmest greetings. Your Elbenwald Team

Content:

Title: Eine unendliche Geschichte
Content:
Diving into Harry Potter is pure adventure, unfortunately without a clock.
It began with a secret delivery date and so it should remain.
A whisperer whispered the 25th of October into my ear, and so Santino's lady sat by the window of her partner's apartment with her knitting, waiting for the postman. Unfortunately in vain, instead a mail from DHL arrived, Santino and his relatives could not be found. Was the Baron of Lies on the move? What's the deal? DHL contacted me a second time from the depths of the internet, this time with the finding that my address was apparently incorrect and I should please correct it. Santino did so, and to ensure everything goes smoothly, it was done bilingually in German/Italian. My mails must be stuck in a thorny thicket or bounced off a wall of silence, because I haven't heard anything more from DHL.
The tracking tells me my package is slumbering, like Sleeping Beauty, in a depot. All I can do is hope that soon a prince will bring my package to me?
Comment: We are very sorry that this should not have happened. As we have seen, your concern has been resolved with our customer service. ❤️

The heavily reduced costume made a good impression at first glance (in the packaging). Unfortunately, the costume was so old that the plastic lining of the hat disintegrated into crumbs upon unpacking, necessitating a thorough cleaning of the floor afterward. Without the lining, the hat was also unusable, as it no longer had any support.

Title: Authentische Nachbildung von Luke Skywalker
Content:
This figure is modeled after Luke Skywalker's appearance from Episode VI. He wears his black robe, and his green lightsaber is included with the set.
You can change the outfit in one aspect. A second top for the chest is included. However, only a silver "tip" changes. The green blade can be removed from the hilt, so it's possible to hang the hilt on the belt.
The joints can also be adjusted, allowing various poses to be recreated. Unfortunately, the joints are quite difficult to adjust.
In my opinion, what this set lacks is the black cloak that Luke wears at the beginning of the film.
Nevertheless, the figure is well modeled after the appearance, the lightsaber hilt is nicely detailed, and at 15cm, the figure is pleasantly large. Of course, €30 for just a figure without additional extras is not little, but there are also significantly more expensive versions.
Comment: Thank you so much for your detailed feedback! Best wishes from the Elbenwald 😊

Title: Eärendil Lampe
Content:
Well... for almost 40€, it's rather a disappointing item. 
At first glance, everything looks like cheap plastic. 
The bottle is crookedly glued to the base.
The distortions on the bottle and the base are poorly and unsightly crafted and painted, and in the middle of the bottle, it looks like there's a plastic blob stuck there. From a bit further away, it looks quite stylish. But you shouldn't look too closely at this nice piece. I wouldn't buy it again for that price. But the box is stylish ^^
Comment: Hey David, that's really a shame and it shouldn't be like this. If a product is defective, you can definitely write to our customer support and then we'll see together what we can do. There will certainly be a solution. Best wishes from the Elbenwald. :)

Title: Ein tolles Ausstellungsstück aber KEIN Schaukampfschwert
Content:
First of all, I would like to emphasize that this is NOT a combat sword. However, you will receive a very detailed and high-quality lightsaber that is an exact replica of the original.

The handle is made of metal and the blade is made of polycarbonate. The blade is powered by 3 AA batteries, which are not included. There are 2 buttons on the handle to activate the functions.
The blade colors available are red and purple, which represent the colors of Revan, as he belonged to both the light and dark sides. The colors are very vibrant and rich.
In addition, the sword offers various sound and light effects.
For example, when turning it on and off, there is the characteristic "hissing" sound. When moving the sword, there are also sounds that are familiar from the movies. When the green button on the handle is pressed, effects can be simulated as if blaster shots are being deflected. The blade color can be easily changed by pressing both buttons. Visually, the effect of "cutting" through a door can also be mimicked.
Additionally, the sword comes with a holder for a Kyber crystal. This can be attached to the handle instead of the blade. However, the small light beam produced by this is barely noticeable. Therefore, it looks better visually if the crystal is presented next to the sword.
Furthermore, a presentation stand is included. This looks very good visually and, thanks to the rubber reinforcements, the handle can be securely placed on it.

The blade wobbles slightly in the handle. This is not particularly strong, but it prevents the sword from being used for intense combat.
Therefore, this sword, with its high-quality optics and materials, is an impressive display piece that should not be missing from any lightsaber collection.
Comment: Wooooooow, thank you so much for your detailed feedback! We are very happy to hear that you are satisfied with the lightsaber. ❤️ Best wishes from the Elvenwood 🤗

Title: Preis/Leistung->Qualität= absolut mangelhaft
Content: For the price, it's absolutely outrageous. It looks beautiful in itself. However, it is extremely uncomfortable to wear, my girlfriend scratches herself on the edges all the time and gets caught on anything that's made of fabric and even her own hair. One could possibly overlook that, but now, after wearing it for over a month, the upper part with the stones has come loose and is only hanging on by a small corner. Honestly, for the price, it's so cheaply made, I find it appalling.
Comment: Hey Martin, that's really a shame and it shouldn't be like this. If a product is defective, you can definitely write to our customer support and then we'll see together what we can do. There will certainly be a solution. Best wishes from the Elbenwald. :)

Title: Preis/Leistung->Qualität= mangelhaft
Content: The ring appears to be quite cheaply made, more like something from a gumball machine, and the red "stone" in the center looks like cheap plastic. It doesn't feel like silver at all. Moreover, after wearing it for less than a month, 3 out of the 4 stones surrounding the red one have fallen out. So definitely not something to wear, and I'm waiting for the "silver" to start flaking off. A shame for the price because it's quite nice looking otherwise.
Comment: Hey Martin, that's really a shame and it shouldn't be like this. If a product is defective, you can definitely write to our customer support and then we'll see together what we can do. There will certainly be a solution. Best regards from the Elbenwald. :)

Title: Hingucker und auch noch bequem

I think it's great!
